en: "Hey lady, hey baby, hey! Why don't you grab us a drink?"

zh: 那时的空姐们，并非我的朋友
那时的空乘们并非我的朋友
那时空姐们不是我的朋友呀
en: And the flight attendants weren't my friends back then

zh: 他们说你比我们好吗，你觉得
他们说你比我们强吗，你觉得
en: And they said "Are you better than us, do you think?"
But I kept getting hired
And the World War II crew, they retired
And the girls all thought much higher of me

zh: 读史，一九八六，历史首位美国女队长
en: 1986, the first female American captain in history
Suddenly I've got my wings

zh: 突然之间众飞行员反对我
突然间，飞行员们都反对我
突然间，所有飞行员抗议我
en: Suddenly all of those pilots protesting me
Well, they can get their own drinks! Haha!

zh: 突然间没人说脚踏实地了
突然间没人说脚踏实地了
突然间，没人说脚踏实地了
en: Suddenly there's no one saying "Stay grounded"
Looking down, passing them by
Suddenly I've got an all female crew

zh: 新闻火了，世界各地都成了头条
新闻传开，世界各地都成为头条
en: The news caught, and made headlines across the world
Suddenly it stopped
No one saying "You can't" or "You won't"

zh: 你知道作为女孩，你不算什么
en: Or "You know you're not anything 'cause you're a girl"
Suddenly I'm getting married
And we're putting pins on the map where we've flown
Suddenly I am a mother

zh: 忽然惊讶于他们已长大
突然惊讶于他们已长大
en: And suddenly shocked at how much they've grown

zh: 突然我想起父母会作何感受
突然我在想父母会作何感想
突然间，我好奇父母会怎么想
en: Suddenly I'm wondering how my parents would feel

zh: 看见我教男人驾驶飞机
突然看见我教人开飞机
en: Seeing me teaching men to be pilots

zh: 因为我突然成了资深导师
因为突然我成了高级导师
因为忽然我成了资深导师
en: 'Cause suddenly I am a senior instructor
And somehow I'm 51

zh: 突然我飞巴黎到達拉斯
突然我飞往巴黎达拉斯
突然我飞巴黎至达拉斯
en: Suddenly I'm flying Paris to Dallas

zh: 大西洋上，心情平静如绿依
在大西洋上，感觉平静如儿
en: Across the Atlantic and feeling calm

zh: 当空中交通突然有人说起时
en: When suddenly someone on air-to-air traffic says:
"At 8:46 there's been a terrorist action"

zh: 我心中最珍惜的事物之一
我心中最爱的那一件事儿
en: And the one thing I loved more than anything
Was used as the bomb
Suddenly I'm in a hotel
Suddenly something has died

zh: 突然间，我与天空间出现了什么
突然间，我与天空之间有了什么
en: Suddenly there's something in between me and the sky

zh: 世界边缘或我们所在的地方
在世界尽头或我们身处何方
在世界边缘，或我们所在之处
en: On the edge of the world or wherever we are

zh: 我们在世界尽头，濒临边缘
en: We are – we are – we are on the edge

zh: 是否有事我需做些什么
是否有事我需做些事情
是否有事，我该做些什么
en: Is there something - I need to do something

zh: 让我不再想起电视上那些画面
阻止我回想起电视上那些画面
让我远离电视上那些画面纷乱
en: To keep me from thinking of all those scenes on the tube

zh: 我需寻事做，以远新闻映眼前
en: I need something to do – 'cause I can't watch the news
On the edge
Make me a channel of your peace
Where there is hatred
Let me bring your love
Where there is injury
Your pardon, Lord
And where there's doubt
True faith in you
Where there's despair in life
Let me bring hope
Where there is darkness, only light

zh: 啊主啊，请让我永不寻求
噢，主啊，请让我永不追求
哦主人，请让我永不寻求
en: O master, grant that I may never seek

zh: 愿你安慰我，如同安慰自己
en: So much to be consoled As to console

zh: 使我被理解如同去理解
能被理解，如同我能理解
愿被理解，如同理解他人
en: To be understood As to understand

zh: 愿被爱如深爱，全心全意
en: To be loved As to love with all my soul
And where there's sadness
Ever joy

zh: 现在有个庄重，古老传统
en: Now there's a solemn, old tradition
For admission - or audition - to
Transition from a Come From Away

zh: 无论如何，唯有选择离开
无论如何，唯求重生等待
无论如何，唯有放手离开
en: The only other way at any rate
Is pass away and pray to fate and
Wait to reincarnate
As a Newfoundlander
Hey, hey - come on inside
Nothing ventured, nothing tried
You'll be a Newfoundlander
Hey, hey - sit down right here
You'll feel better in a year
Now the first part is the easiest
We'll soon get to the queasiest
I'll need you to repeat this mess
'Cause we speaks a different language, son
We adds some esses and some rum
You'll have to try a good cod tongue
When you become a Newfoundlander
Hey, hey - just do your best
Nothing scary, nothing yet
And you'll be a Newfoundlander
Hey, hey - just sing along
Nothing ventured just prolonged
Now with every transformation
Comes a tiny bit of risk
You've got to walk the plank
And there'll be blood
Or there'll be bliss

zh: 同样的纽芬兰人，啊哈夏花
同样做纽芬兰人，啊哈夏花
纽芬兰人也一样，啊哈夏花
en: And it's the same to be a Newfoundlander
Every person's wish
So don't be dumb
Just take the plunge
Go on - kiss the fish!
Hey, hey - come on tonight
Take a risk and take a ride
Jump right in with both feet tied
Nothing ventured, nothing sore
After it's over, out the door
Thank-you's written everywhere
And things they forgot
The board of health says
Clean it up - every part

zh: 窗外飞机上看，可看到曼哈顿
透过飞机窗户，我看见曼哈顿
en: Out the airplane window, I can see Manhattan
And there's still smoke

zh: 突然我又感到恐惧遍全身
突然间，我又感到恐惧万分
突然我再次感到恐惧万分
en: And suddenly I'm afraid all over again
And there are others afraid too
I know Newark airport

zh: 你可以把卡车停在收费公路旁边
你可以在公路边把卡车停在路边，
在高速公路旁你能把卡车停下来
en: You could pull a truck over on the side of the turnpike

zh: 朝飞来的飞机发射榴弹发射器
朝来飞的飞机发射榴弹发射器
en: And shoot a grenade launcher at a plane coming in
I go straight to his firehouse
Part of me wondered if they
Just weren't telling me
But... they still don't know

zh: 我的公寓依旧，独留空寂
我的公寓依旧，如我所离
en: My flat is the same as I left it
But emptier Quieter
I start to unpack
And I find the camera

zh: 在去餐馆的路上，把女儿送到学校前
在去餐厅的途中，我送我女儿去学校
在去餐厅的路上，我送女儿到学校，但
en: On the way to my restaurant I drop my daughter at school
But she won't go in
She says she's scared
What do I tell her?
Back at my dad's house
I look out the window
At this view I've looked at my whole life
And now a part of it
Something's missing
Kevin breaks up with me

zh: 他辞职回家，搬回纽约，啊哈
然后他辞职，回到纽约的家
然后他辞职搬家回纽约啊
en: And then he quits and moves back home to New York
And I miss him
I miss his jokes

zh: 尼和我商量，尽量联系多
en: Nick and I call each other when we can
But... it's awful

zh: 我们相遇的唯一原因是这可怕的事发生了
我们相遇唯独因为这个可怕的事情发生了
en: The only reason we met was because this terrible thing happened
I go down to Ground Zero
Which is like the end of the world
It's literally still burning

zh: 爸爸问你被困时，一切都好吗
父亲问你当时被困，过得好吗
en: My dad asks: "Were you okay where you were stranded?"

zh: 如何告诉他，我不只是还好
我如何告诉他那不仅还好
如何告诉他，我不只是安好
en: How do I tell him that I wasn't just okay
I was so much better
I phone American and say:

zh: 我随时准备去你想让去的地方
我已准备好随您所想去往何方
我准备好随你安排去任何地方
en: "I'm ready to go wherever you want to send me."
But they say take a few days off

zh: 我每天打电话，周四回到空荡荡的机场
我每天打电话询问，周四又回到了机场
我每天打电话，然后在星期四回到机场
en: I phone every day and I am back in the airport on Thursday
And it's empty, silent
It's just... a different place

zh: 我停下来，向那几个乘客致意说
我停下来，对仅有的几个乘客说
我拦住那些寥寥无几的乘客说
en: And I stop what few passengers there are and I say:
"Thank you for still flyin'."
You are here
At the end of a moment
At the end of the world
On the edge of the ocean
Where the story ends
Stop the world
Take a picture
Try to capture
To ensure this moment lasts
We're still in it, but
In a minute
That's the limit
And this present will be past
So here we are
Where the world has come together
So here she'll be
In this picture, forever
Seize the moment

zh: 但他离去刹那，你孤独，事已逝
en: But the minute he goes you're alone, and it's through
Pinch yourself
Tell yourself:

zh: 你在做梦，那代表他将忘记你
你在做梦，这表示他会忘记你
你在做梦，意味着他会忘记你
en: "You're just dreaming, that means he'll forget about you"
But here we are

zh: 大陆曾相撞，如今各奔东西
曾大陆相撞，如今分离独立
大陆曾相撞，如今各自分离
en: Where the continents once crashed together

zh: 他们各自分道扬镳，永远离别，所以
en: Before they went their separate ways forever, so

zh: 在北美东北角的边缘地区
北美洲东北角上有个地方
en: On the north-east tip of North America
On an island called Newfoundland
There's an airport

zh: 过去曾是世界最大的机场之一
这里曾经是世界最大机场之一
曾经是世界上最大的机场之一
en: It used to be one of the biggest airports in the world

zh: 旁边有个叫甘德的镇子
en: And next to it is a town called Gander

zh: 欢迎来到远方的摇滚之地(嘿)
en: Welcome to the Rock if you come from away (Hep!)

zh: 大概你只能明白我们说一半儿(Hep)
你可能只明白我们说的一半儿(Hep)
en: You probably understand about a half of what we say (Hep!)

zh: 他们言人非孤岛，却孤岛造就奇迹
人言无人孤岛居，然岛养育真君子
en: They say no man's an island, but an island makes a man
That mornin' I'm in the classroom

zh: 我们第一天回校，校车却罢工了
我们第一天回学校，校车罢工了
我们开学第一天，校车却罢工了
en: It's our first day back and the school buses are on strike!

zh: 我，暂时顶替安内特，她迟到了
那，我替安妮特掩护，她迟到了
我，代课老师的安妮特迟到了
en: So, I'm covering for Annette who's running late
Welcome to the Rock!

zh: 一个岛民，我就是个岛民
我是岛民，身为一个岛民
我是岛民，我就是个岛民
en: An islander, I am an islander

zh: 我是个岛民，我是一位岛民
我是个岛民，我就是个岛民
en: I'm an islander, I am an islander
At the start of a moment
On the edge of the world
Where the river meets the sea
On the edge of the Atlantic
On an island in between
There and here
Welcome to the fog
Welcome to the trees
To the ocean and the sky
And whatever's in between
To the ones who've left
You're never truly gone
A candle's in the window
And the kettle's always on
When the sun is coming up
And the world has come ashore
If you're hoping for a harbour
Then you'll find an open door
In the winter, from the water
Through whatever's in the way
To the ones who have come from away
Do you wanna build a snowman
Come on let’s go and play
I never see you anymore
Come out the door
It’s like you’ve gone away
We used to be best buddies

zh: 曾经好友，现今非，愿告我因
en: And now we’re not, I wish you would tell me why
It doesn't have to be a snowman
Or ride our bike around the halls
I think some company is overdue

zh: 我开始对着墙上的照片说话了
en: I started talking to the pictures on the walls

zh: 此句子有些孤独，这些空房间
en: It gets a little lonely, all these empty rooms
just watching the hours tick by
People are asking where you’ve been
They say have courage
And I’m trying to

zh: 我就在这，等候，开门吧啊
我就在这为你，让我进吧
en: I’m right out here for you, just let me in
We only have each other

zh: 就只有你我，咱们要干嘛啊
就你我两个，我们要干嘛啊
只有你和我，我们要干嘛啊
en: It's just you and me, what are we gonna do
Do you wanna build a snowman?
Is it the clumpy way he walks
or the grumpy way he talks?

zh: 或者是梨形方形古怪他的脚丫
或是那梨形，方块形的奇异脚丫
或者那梨形，方形奇怪的脚丫吧
en: Or the pear-shaped, square-shaped weirdness of his feet?

zh: 尽管我们知他洗澡好却总是有点臭臭啊
尽管我们知他洗净身，味道仍略带怪啊哈
en: And though we know he washes well-he always ends up sort of smelly

zh: 但你绝遇不到如此敏感甜美的伙伴啊
但你定会遇不到如此敏感甜美的人啊
en: But you’ll never meet a fellow who’s as sensitive and sweet!

zh: 他有点需要修补的地方，看
他需要修补，我们会帮忙，0
他有些需要修复的地方，0
en: So he’s a bit of a fixer-upper,
so he’s got a few flaws
Like his peculiar brain-dear,
his thing with the reindeer

zh: 那有点超出自然法规界限
en: That’s a little outside of nature’s laws!

zh: 他是个需要修补的人，但这点我们确信
en: So he’s a bit of a fixer-upper, but this we’re certain of

zh: 只需用一点爱，让这个修补者焕然一新
en: You can fix this fixer-upper up with a little bit of love!
Is it the way that he runs scared,
or that he’s socially impaired

zh: 或许他只是喜欢在树林里玩耍
或是他独爱林间轻响，啊哈夏花
en: Or that he only likes to tinkle in the woods

zh: 你因他不够阳刚的金发而抑制好感吗
他缺乏男人味的金发让你抑制喜爱吗
en: Are you holding back your fondness due to his unmanly blondness

zh: 或许是他掩饰诚实本性的方式
或许是他掩饰诚实品质的方式
或他掩饰自己是真诚品的方式
en: Or the way he covers up that he’s the honest goods

zh: 他只是稍微需要修整一下，0
en: He’s just a bit of a fixer-upper,
he’s got a couple of bugs

zh: 他孤独无依，这证明了他渴望人类拥抱的紧迫感
en: His isolation is confirmation of his desperation for human hugs
but we know what to do

zh: 改造破败者的方法，就是将你与他结合
en: The way to fix up this fixer-upper is to fix him up with you!

zh: 所以她是个小修补师傅，没事儿
en: So she’s a bit of a fixer-upper,
that’s a minor thing

zh: 这个提议承诺是灵活的安排
这句引用的订婚是弹性安排
这个引语订婚是个灵活安排
en: This quote ‘engagement’ is a flex arrangement
And by the way I don’t see no ring!
her brain’s a bit betwixt

zh: 让未婚夫离开，一切问题就解决了
把未婚夫摆平了，整件事就解决了
把未婚夫解决掉，整件事就搞定了
en: Get the fiance out of the way and the whole thing will be fixed
We’re not saying you can change him,
cuz people don’t really change

zh: 我们只是说爱是种力量
我们只说爱是强大力量
en: We’re only saying that love’s a force
that’s powerful and strange

zh: 人们生气时，害怕，紧张，会做错误选择，啊哈夏花
en: People make bad choices if they’re mad, or scared, or stressed

zh: 给予他们一点关爱(施以点滴爱心)
en: Throw a little love their way (throw a little love their way)
and you’ll bring out their best
True love brings out their best!

zh: 每个人都有需要改进的地方，这就是生活的真相
en: Everyone’s a bit of a fixer-upper, that’s what it’s all about!

zh: 父亲姐姐哥哥我们互相扶持，让彼此圆满成长
en: Father! Sister! Brother! We need each other to raise us up and round us out

zh: 每个人都有些瑕疵，需要改进，唉
en: Everyone’s a bit of a fixer-upper,
but when push comes to shove

zh: 唯一能修复修复者的真情爱意，才是真正的修复者
en: The only fixer-upper fixer that can fix up a fixer-upper is true love
The window is open so’s that door
I didn’t know they did that anymore

zh: 谁知我们有八千个沙拉盘呢
谁知我们有八千盘沙拉盘呢
en: Who knew we owned eight thousands salad plates?
For years I’ve roamed these empty halls
Why have a ballroom with no balls?

zh: 最后他们终于敞开了大门
最终，他们终于打开了大门
en: Finally they’re opening up the gates

zh: 将会有真实活生生的人在
en: There’ll be actual real live people
It’ll be totally strange

zh: 但我对这改变充满期待
en: But wow am I so ready for this change
Cuz for the first time in forever
There’ll be music, there’ll be light
For the first time in forever
I’ll be dancing through the night

zh: 不知是喜悦还是肚咕噜
en: Don’t know if I’m elated or gassy
But I’m somewhere in that zone
I won’t be alone
I’m getting what I’m dreaming of
A chance to change my lonely world
A chance to find true love
Don’t let them in, don’t let them see

zh: 当个乖巧女孩，始终如一
做好女孩，你总是要如此
始终保持那个善良的你
en: Be the good girl you always have to be
Conceal
Conceal don’t feel don’t let them know
I know it all ends tomorrow,
So it has to be today
Nothing’s  in my way!
Born of cold and winter air.
And mountain rain combining.
This icy force both foul and fair.
Has a frozen heart worth mining.
So cut through the heart. Cold and clear.
Strike for love and strike for fear.
See the beauty sharp and sheer.

zh: 破碎冰心，破解冰封心事
en: Split the ice apart. And break the frozen heart.
Ice has a magic can’t be controlled.
Stronger than one. Stronger than ten.
Stronger than a hundred men!

zh: 真的吗我猜你从未经历过炎炎夏日
真的吗我猜你不太了解炎热的天气
en: Really? I’m guessing you don’t have much experience with heat.

zh: 嗯但有时我喜欢闭上眼，
哪但有时我喜欢闭上眼
en: Nope! But sometimes I like to close my eyes

zh: 想象夏天到来时会是什么样子
想象夏日到来时会是什么样子
想象夏天到来时，会是什么样子
en: and imagine what it’d be like when summer does come

zh: 蜜蜂嗡，孩子吹蒲公英籽
en: Bees’ll buzz, kids’ll blow dandelion fuzz

zh: 我将像夏日雪花般做任何事
那我将做雪在夏天该做的事
我在夏天也会像雪一样做事
en: And I’ll be doin’ whatever snow does in summer

zh: 手拿饮品，雪地映衬炽热的沙漠
en: A drink in my hand, my snow up against the burning sand

zh: 夏日阳光晒成美丽古铜色，
在夏日，美美地晒成古铜色
夏天里，我将美美地晒黑了
en: Prob’ly getting gorgeously tanned in summer

zh: 我终将遇见夏风轻拂，吹散寒冬风波
en: I’ll finally see a summer breeze, blow away a winter storm

zh: 探索冰融为水奥秘，炎热下变化莫测
发现冰水变暖时会发生什么变化呢
en: And find out what happens to solid water when it gets warm!

zh: 我迫不及待看，朋友们觉得我如何
我急切想看看，朋友们如何看待我
en: And I can’t wait to see, what my buddies all think of me

zh: 想象一下，夏日里我会有多酷热
想象一下，夏天我会变得多酷呢
en: Just imagine how much cooler I’ll be in summer

zh: 热冷都很强烈，交融共存
en: The hot and the cold are both so intense
Put’em together  it just makes sense!

zh: 冬季宜窝家緊抱暖暖，嗯林
en: Winter’s a good time to stay in and cuddle

zh: 但若在夏天，我会变成快乐的雪人
夏日阳光下，我会变成快乐的雪人
但若置身夏季，我便是快乐的雪人
en: But put me in summer and I’ll be a happy snowman!

zh: 当生活艰，我愿紧握梦想
en: When life gets rough, I like to hold on to my dream

zh: 沐浴夏日阳光里，释放压力忙
en: Relaxing in the summer sun, just lettin’ off steam

zh: 天空蓝如此，你们也将在旁
天空蔚蓝色，你们也同在旁

zh: 嘲笑着我姐姐，她让房间闪耀
在欢笑中，我姐姐令满屋闪耀
en: Laughin’ at my sister as she’s dazzling the room

zh: 你走进来，我心砰然如傲
你走进来，我心如烟花爆
你走进来，我心砰然一跳
en: Then you walked in and my heart went “Boom!”

zh: 试图在舞厅一侧引起你注意
en: Tryin’ to catch your eye from the side of the ballroom

zh: 人人都在跳舞，乐队声音震天地
众人跳舞，乐队声音高涨到极致
en: Everybody’s dancin’ and the band’s top volume
Grind to the rhythm as we wine and dine

zh: 拉我妹，轻声说这妞我中意
en: Grab my sister, and whisper “Yo, this one’s mine.”

zh: 我姐姐慢慢走向你，我有点慌
姐姐走过房间，来到你的身边
en: My sister made her way across the room to you

zh: 我紧张起来，心想她要做什么
我变得紧张，想着她要做什么
我开始紧张，想着她要做什么
en: And I got nervous, thinking “What’s she gonna do?”

zh: 她抓住你手臂，我想我完了
她抓住你手臂，我想我完了
她拉住你胳膊，我想我完了
en: She grabbed you by the arm, I’m thinkin’ “I’m through”

zh: 你回头看向我，突然我无助了
你看着我，我突然变得无助了
en: Then you look back at me and suddenly I’m Helpless!
Where are you taking me?
I’m about to change your life
Then by all means, lead the way

zh: 过了一周，每晚写信啊哈夏花
en: One week later, I’m writin’ a letter nightly

zh: 现在生活好，每封信你写给我啊
生活变得更好，每封你写的信啊
现在我生活好，信件一封笑哈哈
en: Now my life gets better, every letter that you write me

zh: 笑着看我妹，因为她想组后宫啊
en: Laughin’ at my sister, cuz she wants to form a harem

zh: 只是说，若真爱我，共享他啊
只是说，真爱我会，分享给他
en: I’m just sayin’, if you really loved me, you would share him

zh: 两星期后，客厅里紧张兮兮
en: Two weeks later, In the living room stressin’

zh: 父亲面无表情，你请求他的祝福时
父亲面无表情，当你向他求祝福时
父亲面若石，你恳求他赐福儿绿依
en: My father’s stone-faced While you’re asking for his blessin’

zh: 我内心痛苦，你畅饮畅食
en: I’m dying inside, as You wine and dine

zh: 我努力忍住眼泪因为你的心能创造奇迹
我正努力不哭泣，因为你的意志坚强无比
en: And I’m tryin’ not to cry ‘cause there’s nothing that your mind can’t do

zh: 爸爸走过房间来找你，过去
en: My father makes his way across the room To you

zh: 我一时惊慌，觉得我们完了
我惊慌失措，觉得我们完了，
我惊慌一秒，心想我们完了
en: I panic for a second, thinking “we’re through”

zh: 但接着，他摇你的手说真实
但他握住你的手说真诚点
他握住你的手，说要真实，你
en: But then he shakes your hand and says “Be true”

zh: 你转身对我，笑了，我无助
你转回我身边，笑，我无助
你转回头看我，笑，我无助
en: And you turn back to me, smiling, and I’m Helpless!

zh: 伊莱莎，我名字旁没一分硬币
en: Eliza, I don’t have a dollar to my name

zh: 一片土地，指挥一个团，小有点名气
一片土地，领导一群兵，名声一点儿
en: An acre of land, a troop to command, a dollop of fame

zh: 我仅有我的荣誉，忍受痛苦的力量，一些大学学分和我的聪明才智
en: All I have’s my honor, a tolerance for pain, A couple of college credits and my top-notch brain

zh: 疯狂，你的家人展现出我不同的侧面
疯狂，你家人让我展现出不同的一面
疯狂，你的家人展现出我不同的一面
en: Insane, your family brings out a different side of me

zh: 裴姬向我倾诉，安吉丽卡咬我一口试试
en: Peggy confides in me, Angelica tried to take a bite of me

zh: 不忧，我对你的爱从无疑虑
无忧，我对你的爱毫不怀疑
无忧，我对你的爱从未怀疑
en: No stress, my love for you is never in doubt

zh: 我们在哈林找个小地儿，一起解决问题
我们将在哈林找个小地，然后解决问题
我们将在哈莱姆找小屋，解决所有问题
en: We’ll get a little place in Harlem and we’ll figure it out

自小无家可归，父母离散，我独自成长
en: I’ve been livin’ without a family since I was a child

爸爸离开，妈妈去世，我长大不羁
爸爸走了，妈妈去世，我成野孩子
en: My father left, my mother died, I grew up buckwild

zh: 但我永不忘母亲面容，真心如故
但我永难忘母亲容颜，真挚无虚
en: But I’ll never forget my mother’s face, that was real

zh: 只要我活着，艾莉莎，我发誓你不会那么无助
只要我还活着，艾莉莎，对天发誓你不会无助
只要我活着，艾丽莎，向天发誓你永不感无助
en: And long as I’m alive, Eliza, swear to God You’ll never feel so helpless
A toast to the groom, To the bride

zh: 来自姐妹，永远在你身侧
你姐姐，永远陪伴你身侧
en: From your sister, Who is always by your side

zh: 致你们结合，愿希望永相随
愿你们结合，为爱带来希望
en: To your union And the hope that you provide
May you always Be satisfied

zh: 我记得那个夜晚，可能余生都会后悔那一夜
en: I remember that night I just might Regret that night for the rest of my days

zh: 我记得那些兵哥哥，争相摔倒赢得我们赞歌
en: I remember those soldier boys Tripping over themselves to win our praise

zh: 我记得那如梦般烛光，犹如无法捉摸的梦境
我记得那如梦的烛光，犹如难以捉摸的梦影
我记得那如梦烛光，似一场难以捕捉的梦境
en: I remember that dreamlike candlelight Like a dream that you can't quite place

zh: 亚历山大，我永不忘初见你容颜的那一刻
en: But Alexander I'll never forget the first Time I saw your face
I have never been the same

zh: 聪明眼神，饥饿面容里闪烁
聪明眼神在饥渴骨感轮廓
聪明的眼神在渴望的轮廓
en: Intelligent eyes in a hunger-pang frame

zh: 当你说嗨时，我忘了我名字
当你说嗨时，我忘了我真名
en: And when you said Hi, I forgot my dang name

zh: 将我的心燃烧每一角落
让我心燃，全身火焰炙热
点燃我心，全身炽热如火
en: Set my heart aflame every part aflame
This is not a game

zh: 你让我觉得你是个永不满足的女性
你觉得我像一个从未满足过的女人
我觉得你是一个从未满足过的女人
en: You strike me as a woman who has never been satisfied

zh: 我确定你意思不明，你忘记自己
我确信我不明白你，你忘了自己
我确信我不明白你，你忘记自己
en: I'm sure I don't know what you mean, You forget yourself
You're like me I'm never satisfied
Is that right
I have never been satisfied

zh: 这就是与水平相当的人斗智的感觉，有秋
en: So this is what it feels like to match wits With someone at your level
What the hell is the catch

zh: 自由之感，看见光明的时侯
感觉自由，看见光明的时候
感受自由，看见光明的温柔
en: It's The feeling of freedom of seein' the light

zh: 本杰明富兰克林，钥匙风筝手
en: It's Ben Franklin with a key and a kite

这段对话持续了大约两分钟，或许三分钟
这段对话持续了两分钟左右，大概三分钟

我们所说的一切完全一致
我们说的一切都完全一致

zh: 这是一个梦，还有点跳舞的样子，有点姿势，还有点态度
en: it's A dream and it's a bit of a dance A bit of a posture it's a bit of a stance

zh: 他有点轻浮，但我愿给他个机会
他有点轻浮，但我给他一次机会
他有点爱调情，但我给他个机会
en: He's a Bit of a flirt but I'm a give it a chance

en: I asked about his family did you see his answer

zh: 他手开始抖动，他斜眼看去
en: His hands started fidgeting he looked askance

zh: 他身无分文，全靠运气闯荡江湖

Handsome boy does he know it
Peach fuzz and he can't even grow it

zh: 我想带他远离这个地方，度
en: I wanna take him far away from this place

zh: 转头见妹妹无奈面容，她显得无助
我转身看见妹妹无助的脸，她无助
我转身看到妹妹的脸，她显得无助

And Alexander is penniless
That doesn't mean I want him any less

他追求我，因我是舒勒家姐妹，这提高他的地位
他追求我是因我是舒勒姐妹，提升了他的地位

zh: 若抛开此事，我得多天真
若我天真地忽视这事实

好的安杰莉卡，他说得对，他永远不会满足
天使卡很聪明，他说对了，他永远不会满足

Thank you for all your service

en: If it takes fighting a war for us to meet it will have been worth it

zh: 我了解自己，了解姐姐心肠
了解姐姐如知己，心中明朗

He'd be mine
She would say I'm fine
She'd be lying

zh: 当我夜晚幻想时，亚历山大的眼
夜幕降临时幻想，亚历山大的眼

至少我心爱伊丽莎是他妻
en: At least my dear Eliza's his wife
At least I keep his eyes in my life
I may not live to see our glory!
But I’ve seen wonders great and small
‘Cause if the tomcat can get married
There’s hope for our ass, after all!
Raise a glass to freedom
Something you will never see again!
No matter what she tells you
Let’s have another round tonight!
Raise a glass to the four of us!
To the newly not poor of us!
We’ll tell the story of tonight
Let’s have another round
Congrats to you, Lieutenant Colonel

Now, be sensible

What do you mean?

I will never understand you

He's on the British side in Georgia

It takes and it takes and it takes
And we keep loving anyway

zh: 我们笑，我们哭，我们犯错，嗯林

zh: 若我陪伴着她，无数人曾尝试过，必有原因

Then I'm willing to wait for it

Death doesn’t discriminate
Between the sinners and the saints
And we keep living anyway

我们崛起后又跌倒，我们破碎又犯错

若仍有理由我依然活着，当所有爱我的人已离去
若仍有理由让我存活，当所有爱我的人都已离世
en: And if there’s a reason I’m still alive When everyone who loves me has died
I’m willing to wait for it
Wait for it

我生命中唯一能掌控的事
生命中我唯一能掌控之事

zh: 我是无可比拟的，我是独一无二
en: I am inimitable, I am an original
I’m not falling behind or running late
I’m not standing still
I am lying in wait

汉密尔顿面朝无尽上升路
汉密尔顿面无止尽爬山道

zh: 他要证明什么，他无失无得
en: He has something to prove, He has nothing to lose

What is it like in his shoes?

He takes and he takes and he takes
And he keeps winning anyway
He changes the game
He plays and he raises the stakes

zh: 若他逆境中茁壮成长，众人生者寥寥，我愿等待其出现
en: And if there’s a reason He seems to thrive when so few survive, then I'm willing to wait for it
Life doesn't discriminate
We rise and we fall and we break
And we make our mistakes

若仍有缘由我仍存生，众多逝去者感何多

Then I'm willin' to Wait for it...

我从未见过将军如此落魄，沮丧
我从未见过这位将军如此沮丧

我接手处理了他所有的信件往来

唯有一条路可以赢得胜利
我们只有一条路赢得胜利

Provoke outrage, outright
Don’t engage, strike by night

持续无情直至敌军逃离
坚定到底，直至敌军逃离

Stay alive ‘til this horror show is past

Raise a glass!

我回到纽约继续我的学徒生活
我回到纽约，继续我的学徒工作

en: And every day’s a test of our camaraderie And bravery

zh: 切断供应链，窃取偷运货
