I am no one! I'm nothing!
I'm only Aldonza the whore!
Oh, I am a little barber
And I go my merry way
With my razor and my leeches
I can always earn my pay
Though your chin be smooth as satin,
You will need me soon I know
For the Lord protects his barbers,
And He makes the stubble grow.
If I slip when I am shaving you
And cut you to the quick,
You can use me as a doctor
'Cause I also heal the sick.
I have dreamed thee too long,
Never seen thee or touched thee.
But known thee with all of my heart.
Half a prayer, half a song,
Thou hast always been with me,
Though we have been always apart.
Dulcinea... Dulcinea...

zh: 我看见天堂，看见你，杜西妮娅
我看见天堂，见你时，杜西妮娅
我看见天堂，你在那，啊哈夏花
en: I see heaven when I see thee, Dulcinea,
And thy name is like a prayer

zh: 天使呢喃达琳娜达琳娜
en: An angel whispers... Dulcinea... Dulcinea!
If I reach out to thee,
Do not tremble and shrink
From the touch of my hand on thy hair.
Let my fingers but see
Thou art warm and alive,
And no phantom to fade in the air.
I have sought thee, sung thee,
Dreamed thee, Dulcinea!
Now I've found thee,
And the world shall know thy glory,
The Golden Helmet of Mambrino!
With so illustrious a past,
Too long hast thou been lost to glory,
Th'art rediscovered now at last!
Golden Helmet of Mambrino
There can be no hat like thee!
Thou and I now, ere I die now,
Will make golden history!
I can hear the cuckoo singing
In the cuckooberry tree...
If he says that that's a helmet,
I suggest that you agree...
But he'll find it is not gold
And will not make him bold and brave...
Well, at least he'll find it useful
If he ever needs a shave!
Thou Golden Helmet of Mambrino,
Thy deeds the world will not forget,
Now Don Quixote de La Mancha,
Will bring thee greater glory yet!
I like him, I really like him.

zh: 剥掉指甲一个一个，我爱他
一个个拔我的指甲，我爱他
逐个拔下我的指甲，我爱他
en: Tear out my fingernails one by one, I like him!
I don't have a very good reason,

zh: 自从和他一起，知更鸟果季来临了
和他在一起，我喜鹊果季度丰收了
en: Since I've been with him, Cuckoo-nuts have been in season...
But there's nothing I can do,
Chop me up for onion stew,

zh: 尽管无法言表，仍会向天空呐喊
en: Still I'll yell to the sky Though I can't tell you why,
That I like him!

zh: 请把我剥得像烫伤的鸡，
把我扒得像只烫过的鸡，
把我剥得像只烫过的鸡，
en: Pluck me naked as a scalded chicken,
Don't ask me for why or wherefore,

zh: 只因我一个好理由都没有，因此
因为我没有一个好原因或因此
因为我没有一个好理由或因此
en: 'Cause I don't have a single good "Because" or "therefore!"
You can barbecue my nose.
Make a giblet of my toes,
Make me freeze, make me fry.
Make me sigh, make me cry.
I come for love, I come for love,
I come to Aldonza for love!
One pair of arms is like another
I don't know why or who's to blame,
I'll go with you or with your brother
It's all the same, it's all the same.
This I have learned:
That when the light's out,
No man will bum with special flame,

zh: 在夜晚来临前向我证明，
你将在黑夜前向我证明，
在夜晚结束前，证明给我
en: You'll prove to me before the night's out,
You're all the same, you're all the same.
So do not talk to me of love,
I'm not a fool with starry eyes,
Just put your money in my hand,
And you will get what money buys!
Oh, I have seen too many beds,
But I have known too little rest,
And I have loved too many men
With hatred burning in my breast.
I do not like you or your brother,
I do not like the life I live,
But I am me, I am Aldonza.
And what I give, I choose to give.
I'm only thinking of him!
In my body; it's well known,
There is not one selfish bone...

zh: 我只在乎他，心中充满忧虑
我只关心他，不禁为他忧虑
我只在乎他的想法和忧虑
我满心都是他，忧虑不已啊
我一心挂念他，忧心忡忡啊
我只在想他，心忧他啊夏花
en: I'm only thinking and worrying about him!
I've been, told he's chasing dragons
And I fear it may be true
If my groom should hear about it.
Heaven knows what he will do!
Oh, I deadly love my uncle,
But for what he's done to me,
I would like to take and lock him up
And throw away the key!
But  if I do... but  if I do...
There is one thing
That I swear will still be true...
In the very heart of me
There is Christian charity
Oh, I think he's been too lonely,
Living years without a spouse,
So when he returns

zh: 我恐怕家中会有麻烦事
我担心家里会有纷扰事
我害怕家中会有麻烦事
en: I fear I may have trouble in the house;
For they say he seeks a lady
Who his own true love shall be;
God forbid that in his madness
He should ever think  it's me!
If he should try  I'll surely die,
And I will grimly
Guard my honor as I cry...
What a comfort, to be sure,
That their motives are so pure...

zh: 当他们为他忧虑和思考时
为他们思慮操心，关怀備至
当他们为他思考与担忧时
en: As they go thinking and worrying about him!
Hail, Knight of the Woeful Countenance,
Knight of the Woeful Countenance!
Wherever you go
People will know Of the glorious deeds

zh: 来自那忧郁面容的骑士
愁容骑士，苦恼面容骑士
愁容骑士，令人叹为观止
那愁容骑士，儿绿依事词
正是那悲伤面容的骑士
愁容骑士，令人畏惧之士
貌如骑士，忧郁面容骑士
正是这个悲惨面容骑士
en: Of the Knight of the Woeful Countenance!
Oh valorous Knight,
Go and fight for the right,
And battle all villains that be,
But oh, when you do,
What will happen to you
Thank God I won't be there to see!
Knight of the Woeful Countenance
Where ever you go
Fare to the foe,
They will quail at the sight
Farewell and good cheer
Oh my brave cavalier
Ride onward to glorious strife.
I swear when you're gone
I'll remember you well
For all of the rest of my life.
People will know
Of the glorious deeds
Do you sing for me?
Do you bring me word
Of one I know?
Little bird, little bird,
I love her so,
I have to know
Little bird, little bird.
Beneath this tree,
This cinnamon tree,
We learned to love,
We learned to cry;
For here we met
And here we kissed,
And here one cold and moonless night
We said goodbye
Oh have pity on me
Bring her back to me now
'Neath the cinnamon tree,
I have waited too long
Without a song.
Please fly, please go
little bird, little bird,
And tell her so.

zh: 听我言，哦这荒凉难忍的世间
听我说，哦这荒凉的世界苦难
en: Hear me now, O thou bleak and unbearable world

zh: 汝之卑劣堕落，已至极点
你如此卑劣堕落无极限
你的卑劣堕落无可比肩
en: Thou art base and debauched as can be

zh: 一位勇敢骑士，旗帜高展，向你挑战
勇敢的骑士挥舞着旗帜，向你宣战
勇敢骑士展旌旗，旗帜飘扬向彼岸
en: And a knight with his banners all bravely unfurled
Now hurls down his gauntlet to thee!

zh: 正是我，堂吉诃，拉曼查的领主
我是我，堂吉诃，拉曼查的国主
en: I am I, Don Quixote, the Lord of La Mancha
My destiny calls and I go

zh: 命运之风狂卷，携我飞奔向前去
命运的风儿推我向前，我随其舞
命运狂风将我扶，向前迈进路途
en: And the wild winds of fortune will carry me onward
Oh, whithersoever they blow

zh: 无论风吹何处，我前往荣耀之路
en: Whithersoever they blow, onward to glory I go
I'm Sancho, yes, I'm Sancho
I'll follow my master till the end
I'll tell all the world proudly
I'm his squire, I'm his friend

zh: 听从我，恶人和巫师，罪恶之蛇
听从我，恶徒巫师蛇妖罪孽深
听我说，恶人巫师罪孽之蛇们
en: Hear me heathens and wizards and serpents of sin
All your dastardly doings are past

zh: 为了神圣事业即将迎来开始
神圣事业现在即将迎来开始
en: For a holy endeavor is now to begin
And virtue shall triumph at last
To dream the impossible dream,
To fight the unbeatable foe,
To bear with unbearable sorrow
To run where the brave dare not go;
To right the unrightable wrong.
To love, pure and chaste, from afar,
To try, when your arms are too weary,
To reach the unreachable star!
This is my Quest to follow that star,

zh: 无论如何绝望，无论多远路
en: No matter how hopeless, no matter how far,
To fight for the right
Without question or pause,
To be willing to march into hell
For a heavenly cause!
And I know, if I'll only be true
To this glorious Quest,
That my heart will lie peaceful and calm
When I'm laid to my rest.
And the world will be better for this,

zh: 那一人，受轻蔑，疤痕满身
那一人，受辱并满身伤痕
那男人，受尽嘲笑伤满身，
en: That one man, scorned and covered with scars,
Still strove, with his last ounce of courage,
To reach the unreachable stars!
There is either the wisest mad man
or the madest wise man in world.
He is mad.
Well, in any case, we have failed.

zh: 每个人都有他的杜尔西内娅
为每人心中的达莲妮娅命名
en: To each his Dulcinea that he alone can name...
To each a secret hiding place
Where he can find the haunting face
To light his secret flame.

zh: 与他的杜尔西内娅相伴而立，
en: For with his Dulcinea Beside him so to stand,
A man can do quite anything,
Outfly the bird upon the wing,
Hold moonlight in his hand.
Yet if you build your life on dreams
It's prudent to recall,
A man with moonlight in his hand
Has nothing there at all.
There is no Dulcinea,
She's made of flame and air,
And yet how lovely life would seem

zh: 若人人织梦避忧伤，生活将如夏花
en: If ev'ry man could weave a dream to keep him from despair.
To each his Dulcinea...
Though she's naught but flame and air!
Why does he do the things he does?
Why does he do these things?

zh: 他为何行进在梦中走过，
en: Why does he march Through that dream that he's in,

zh: 荣耀生锈覆盖，老锡斑驳
披着荣耀锈迹斑斑，为何
披着荣耀锈旧锡，是为何
en: Covered with glory and rusty old tin?

zh: 他为何活在这虚幻世界，
他为何活在这虚无世界，
他为何活在虚无缥缈中，
en: Why does he live in a world that can't be,
And what does he want of me...
What does he want of me?
Why does he say the things he says?
Why does he say these things?

zh: 甜蜜杜西妮亚，情书等啊
en: "Sweet Dulcinea" and "missive" and such,

zh: 我触及你衣裙的最下摆，啊
我触碰你衣裳的最下摆，啊
en: "Nethermost hem of thy garment I touch,"

zh: 无人能定，我该如何生活
无人可成为他想要的我，
无人可成为他期望的我,
en: No one can be what he wants me to be,
Oh, what does he want of me...
Doesn't he know

zh: 他去哪里都笑，你知道吗
他走到哪都会被笑话吗
他去哪里都会被嘲笑吧
en: He'll be laughed at wherever he'll go?
And why I'm not laughing myself...
I don't know.
Why does he want the things he wants?
Why does he want these things?

zh: 他为什么敲打不破的墙
他为何击打那不破的墙
为何他总打不破那坚墙
en: Why does he batter at walls that won't break?

zh: 为何他选择付出，而非索取
他为何在索取天性时给予
为什么他宁给予而非索取
en: Why does he give when it's natural to take?
They're called Bui-Doi.
The dust of life.
Conceived in Hell,
And born in strife.

zh: 他们是提醒我们，所有未曾做好的善事
他们是活生生的提醒，我们没做好的事
他们是提醒我们所有未曾做好的善事
en: They are the living reminder of all the good we failed to do.
We can't forget
Must not forget

zh: 他们也是我们的孩子，亦
他们也是我们孩子，也是
他们都是我们孩子，也是
en: That they are all our children, too.
Like all survivors I once thought
When I'm home I won't give a damn

zh: 但如今我明白，困住越南逃不离
en: But now I know I'm caught, I'll never leave Vietnam
War isn't over when it ends,
Some pictures never leave youmind.

zh: 那些孩子们的脸庞，我们留在心底
那些孩子的脸庞，我们留下的回忆
en: They are the faces of the children the ones we left behind
They're called Bui-doi.

zh: 生活尘埃，地狱孕育争斗中诞生
生活尘埃，地狱孕育，纷争中诞生
生活之尘，地狱孕育，纷争中诞生
en: The dust of life, conceived in hell and born in strife

zh: 他们是生命提醒，我们未能行善的痕迹
他们是生活提醒，我们未曾做到的善事
en: They are the living reminders of all the good we failed to do
That's why we know deep in our hearts,
That they are all ourchildren too
These kids hit walls on ev'ry side,
They don't belong in anyplace.

zh: 他们秘密藏不住，脸上显露无疑
他们的秘密无法隐藏，一目了然
en: Their secret they can't hide it's printed on their face.
I never thought one day I'd plead
For half-breeds from a land that's torn

zh: 然后我看到那些孩子，他们出生就是罪过
en: But then I saw a camp for children whose crime was being born

zh: 抱歉，长官，我们必须加速
抱歉，士官，我们必须加速
抱歉，警官，我们必须加速
en: Sorry, sergeant, we must accelerate
State department says we evacuate
The word is, we must be out by dawn

zh: 抱歉，警官，华府直接传来，
抱歉，警官，华盛顿直接来
en: Sorry, sergeant, it's straight from Washington

zh: 没人离开此处，谁都不在
现在无人离地，无人离开
en: No one leaves the grounds now, not anyone

zh: 我们尽快装载飞机，离开
我们越快装好飞机，离开
en: As fast as we load the planes, we're gone
I'm the wife of a soldier
Please, let me through!
Help me, who must I pay?
Tell me what I must do
Please Kim
Hear the phone
I can't get there
Please be home
Please Chris
No one sees
I am lost here
Find me please
Oh, Chris
I still believe
The heart of you
Is here with me
My heart, against all odds
Holds still
Last night I watched him sleeping,
My body pressed to him.
And then he started speaking.
The name I heard him speak was Kim...
Yes, I know that this was years ago,
But when moonlight fills my room I know
You are here, still.
You will return.
I know you will.
My heart against all odds holds still.
I'll live,
Love cannot die.
You will return, you will return,
And I alone know why...
Last night I watched you sleeping.
Once more the nightmare came.
I heard you cry out something,
A word that sounded like a name.
And it hurts me more than I can bear

zh: 明白你心事我无法分，无法晓
了解你部分，永不分享，不知晓
en: Knowing part of you I'll never share, never know.
The time will come
When nothing keeps us apart.
My heart forever more holds still.
It's all over I'm here,
There is nothing to fear!
Chris, what's haunting you?
Won't you let me inside
what you so want to hide.
I need you too!
I will hold you all night
I will make it all right!

zh: 我仍坚信你我相伴安全
我坚信在你身边更安全
我还相信，你跟我很安全
en: I still believe You are safe with me!

zh: 只要我愿听你吐露心事
只要我，但求你说出心意
en: As long as I But I wish you would tell
What you don't want to tell,
can keep believing
I'll live! what you hell must be
You can sleep now.
You can cry now.
And I know why I'm your wife now
I'm yours for life
if you want to die in bed
follow my example
when you see a cloud ahead
it's time to show your class
hit the door before
they make a target of your ass
in times of revolution
when the flag they fly is red
let pride fill up your chest
meanwhile pack a sack
and take the first boat heading west
my precious souvenirs
of all the golden years
Rolex watches in steel
that look practically real
I'll need a little stock
to start me in Bangkok!
forget about your karma
when your life hangs by a thread
don't cry about the fates
grab a stash of cash
and plan a rest'rant in the States
let me stop for a bit
this was my greatest hit
Miss Saigon in her crown
I made queen of the town
I got 'em paying more
for just another whore
here I come
U.S.A.
your next champ's
on his way
for men will always be men
the rules are the same
for kings or for clerks
give me Francs, or Dollars or Yen
I'll set up a game
I know how it works
why was I born of a race
that thinks only of rice
and hates entrepreneurs?
me I belong in a place
where a man sets his price
and you pay, and he's yours
I should be... American!
where every promise lands

zh: 每个商人都知其立之地
商人皆知自己立足之地
商人深知自己立足之地
en: and every businessman knows where he stands
en route to your nirvana
you grab a chance and plunge ahead
and go where people win
heaven's there... oh, shit!
you need a visa to get in
You who I craddled in my arms.
Asking as little as you can.
Little snip of a little man,
I know I'd give my life for you.
You didn't ask me to be born
Why should you learn of war or pain?
To be sure you're not hurt again,
I swear I'd give my life for you.
I've tasted love beyond all fear.

zh: 应知此爱引导你来此处
en: And you should know it's love that brought you here.
And in one perfect night,
When the stars burned like new,
I knew what I must do.

zh: 给你我无法拥有的千万事物
我会给你无数无法拥有之物
en: I'll give you a million things I'll never own.

zh: 我会赠你一个世界等待征服
en: I'll give you a world to conquer when you're grown.
You will be who you want to be.
Can choose whatever heaven grants.
As long as you can have your chance,
Sometimes I wake up, reaching for him.
I feel his shadow brush my head,
But there's just moonlight on my bed.
Was he a ghost?
Was he a lie,
That made my body laugh and cry?

zh: 在我身边，证据显露，他的小孩
身边的证据我看见，他的孩子
en: Then by my side the proof I see, his little one.
Gods of the sun,
Bring him to me.
No one can stop what I must do.
I swear I'd give my life for you
It's alright

zh: 想象一下就好了，没问题
没事，想象就好，都没关系
没事时，只需想象就足矣
en: It's alright when you can just imagine
There's no face, she's not real

zh: 你可以说，一切都没问题
告诉自己，一切都没关系
en: And you can tell yourself it's all okay
But she's here
And my heart cries this isn't happening
But the truth is cold and real
And I know this storm won't go away
Now that I've seen her
There's no way to hide
She is not some fling
From long ago
I know why he lied

zh: 我认为还没知道时更幸福
en: And I think it was better when I didn't know
In her eyes, in her voice
In the heat that filled the air
Part of him still lingers there

zh: 今日她痛苦，难掩忧伤愁
en: I know what pain her life today must be

zh: 若一切归她我，定生死斗
若最后只余她和我共留
en: But if it all comes down to her or me
I don't care, I swear, I'll fight
She's more than a name
I don't hate this girl even so
I can't stay the same
Who's this man that I always trusted?
Now I have to know

zh: 我不是朋友，我有任务要做
en: I'm not as a friend. I have a job to do.

zh: 寻找工作时奇怪发现你在这
en: It's strange to find my work should lead me here to you.

zh: 克里斯了解你，我都告诉他了
克里斯了解你，全都告诉他了
克里斯了解你，我全告诉他了
en: Chris know all anout you, I have shown him all this.

zh: 但是我觉得，是时候了解克里斯了
en: But I think that it's time you know all about Chris.
Please, don't you see that's all I live for.
I have him, and nothing more.
Every night, evrything that's not him,
Disappears behind my door.
Please, he went crazy when he lost you.
Spoke to no one for a year.
Then he finally said, "I'm home now.
My life has to go on here."
Please, let me finish talking please.
This was three whole years ago.
I know how pain can grow

zh: 握住的石头是万里之外的爱情
当你紧握的石头远离爱万里时
当紧抱的石头远隔万里的爱时，
en: When the rock you hold onto is a love miles away.

zh: 听着，求，我早知道这故事了
en: Listen, please, I already know this story.
Take us to the USA.
Oh, Tam, he's here! He's here,

zh: 他如此近，今晚或许共呼吸
en: he's so near we might breathe the same air tonight!
Your father's here!

zh: 真的，泰姆，梦成真不久就能见他
哦，塔姆，真的我梦到了，很快会见
塔姆没错，梦真实，你很快能见他
en: O Tam it's true. My dream was right. You'll see him soon.

zh: 看，我们难道没被守护吗
望，我们一直被保佑看护
请，你看我们一直受庇佑
en: Please, can't you see we've been watched over
As we've crossed the wildest seas.
Even God wants us together,
Can I end this journey, please?
I can't tell her like this.
I should not be the one.
Chris must come see his son.

zh: 求，文件里可没说这儿有个爱的女人
求，文件里没有提到这里有爱的女人
求，文件里没说这有个恋爱中的女人
en: Please, they don't say in the files there's a woman in love here.

zh: 她走了多远，克里斯仍一无所知
她历经艰辛，克里斯仍一无所知
en: What sustained her for miles Chris still knows nothing of.
Can I end this journey please?
You are sunlight and I moon
Joined by the gods of fortune
Midnight and high noon
Sharing the sky
We have been blessed, you and I
You are here like a mystery
I'm from a world that's so different
From all that you are
How in the light of one night
Did we come so far?
Outside day starts to dawn
Your moon still floats on high
The birds awake
The stars shine too
My hands still shake
I reach for you
And we meet in the sky!
Joined here
Bright'ning the sky
With the flame Of love
Tomorrow will be the full moon
I can bring friends to bless our room
With paper unicorns and perfume
If you want me to
CHRIS
Unicorns? sure...

zh: 我父亲在海防城，是位纹身师
en: My father was a tattoo artist in Haiphong

zh: 但他妈妈身上图案不持久
en: But his designs on mother didn't last too long

zh: 妈妈沉迷槟榔果，出卖身体
母亲为了赚钱，靠槟榔度日

zh: 我的任务是带红脸先生回家舍，
en: My job was bringing red-faced monsieurs to our huts
Selling your mom is a wrench
Perfume can cover a stench

zh: 青蛙回去，谁来了猜猜看
青蛙归家，谁来了猜猜看
en: The frogs went home. Who came? Guess who?
Are you surprised we went insane
With dollars pouring down like rain?
Businessmen never rob banks

zh: 我不想浪费才华为贪欲
en: I'm too good to waste my talent for greed
I need room to flex my muscles
In an ocean where the big sharks feed
Make me Yankee, they're my fam'ly
They're selling what people need
what's that I smell in the air
The American dream
sweet as a new millionaire
Pre-packed, ready-to-wear
Fat, like a chocolate eclair
As you suck out the cream
Luck by the tail
How can you fail?
And best of all, it's for sale
Greasy chinks make life so sleazy

zh: 在美国我拥有四星级俱乐部
在美国我会有四星级俱乐部
在美国，我有家四星级俱乐部
en: In the States I'll have a club that's four-starred

zh: 像我这样的人过得舒服
en: Men like me there have things easy

zh: 他们有律师和保镖保护
en: They have a lawyer and a body-guard

zh: 把金发美女卖给客人那
en: To the Johns there I'll sell blondes there
That they can charge on a card
Shlitz down the drain!
Pop the Champagne!
It's time we all entertain
My American dream!
There I will crown
Miss Chinatown
All yours for ten percent down
Don't explain
There's nothing you can say
It's like she's gone insane
She tried to give away her own child

zh: 你可懂，她仍以为嫁给了你
你可知，她仍认为嫁给了你
难道你，她仍以为嫁给了你
en: Don't you see, she still thinks she's married to you

zh: 告诉她不是，必须听并且快
她不知你已离，她该听真相
告诉她她不是，她得听，要快
en: You must tell her she's not, she must hear it and soon

zh: 请别怀疑我，你是我妻子

en: Please don't doubt me Ellen: you're my wife
Lots of guys came back and had no life
I had you

zh: 你尽管说，她已为你生育子儿
任你说何，她已为你生下子儿
她说任她说，可是你已有儿子

zh: 在你恶梦中呼喊的名字是她的
在你噩梦中，喊出的名字是她的
在你噩梦中大喊的名字是她的
en: In your nightmares the name that you shouted was hers

zh: 两年陪伴我，却未共享你所做
你跟我两年，未曾分享你做的
你跟我已两年，未曾分享事多
en: You've been with me two years and not shared things you've done
Don't hold back
Let me see
Is it her now or me?
Let me tell you the way it was

zh: 当年我还懵懂未识自己
当我还不了解我是谁时，
当我还未知自己是谁时
en: Back when I didn't have a clue who I am
The feelings locked behind a dam
That kept me there in Vietnam
There in the shambles of a war
I found what I was looking for
Saigon was crazed, but she was real
And for one moment, I could feel
I saw a world I never knew
And through her eyes I suffered too
In spite of all the things that were
I started to believe in her

zh: 于是我想拯救她，守护她
所以我想拯救她，守护她
那么我想拯救她，守护她

zh: 天，我是美国人，如何不做好事儿
天，我是美国人，怎可能不做好事

zh: 我所做皆是乱，与众人无异
我只是一团糟，与别人无异
我仅制造混乱，与他人无异

zh: 在一个充满我从未理解的秘密之地
en: In a place full of mystery that I never once understood!
I wanted back a world I knew

zh: 我的生命故事再次由你开始
我的一生故事因你重新开始
我的人生故事重新开始于你
en: The story of my life began again with you
It's all right now, that's all through
We'll get past this, start anew will
All I want in my life is you
Oh Ellen i should have told you
Will you ever trust me again
All i have in my life now is you
Now listen guys
It's not so easy
There is this kid
Who looks just like you
Hey, I think it's great
You have each other but he exists
You have to face it

zh: 我经营的营地满是孤儿，
我经营满是孤儿的营地
en: I run a camp that is filled with bui-doi

zh: 寻找父亲，或许永远寻不见啊

zh: 你跟这个男孩，选择并不复杂
面对这个孩子，选择并不复杂

zh: 你想带他离开还是让他留下
你想带他离开，还是让他留下
en: Do you want to take him out or leave him behind?
He's my son
I won't abandon him
Except that, Jesus Christ, John

If it was only Tam
I'd take him now
He is your son
We'd make it work somehow
But Chris, she still loves you
How can I have her near?
There's no choice
I think the answer's clear
They'll have to stay in Bangkok
We'll support them here
I still taste your kisses
Your voice sings in my ear

zh: 你可以背叛我们曾相爱
你可背离昨日情，再归来
你可背离昨日我们相爱
en: You can betray what we were yesterday
But you'll come back tonight for him
Come on, come on, your recitation
Describe your reconciliation
I hope before his stimulation
He bought our little group vacation
In all his dreams he saw our baby
And he's teaching him to fly
Paper dragons in the sky
Yes, papers, what's the situation?
We'll need our cards for immigration
No tricks, I've got my reputation
Don't want no phony complications
See little princess, I was right
You are the first to score tonight
You caught that sergeant by the nose
You stay with him until he goes
Call him Chris
He'll like that
You said you needed a job
You said you'd turn a trick
You'd better prove it, and quick!
Take me away
Don't say a word
Just come with me
My friend
We had a deal for Kim,
But that's on ice
I'm sorry, sergeant,
But I've changed the price

zh: 我需要你大使馆签证啊
我需要你的使馆签证啊
en: I need a visa from your embassy
You get me that,
You'll get the girl for free
Cut the crap, this money's all I got
I don't give visas out.
Is this a deal or not?
You tell me
Okay, okay, the money...it will do

zh: 不幸，给你的劳力士手表
不妙，本为你备劳力士表
en: Too bad, I had a Rolex watch for you

zh: 我会再找途径拿到文件
我会另寻他法取得文件
我会另寻他法拿到文件

I'll make a rich man of some attache
With little shits like him,
You take the bucks and run
He gave me six weeks income,
I'll be gone in one

The girls are hotter 'n' hell

zh: 此地之一将成西贡佳人
此地一缝中必出彩香贡

Is there a war going on?
Don't ask, I ain't gonna tell
How are you doing there, John?
I got the hots for Yvonne
We should get drunk and get laid
Since the end is so near
I tell you, buddy, I've had it.
I don't want to hear
But till they tell me I'm gone
I'm gonna buy you a girl

你喜欢它贴着我的大腿吗

For a marine, I'll show more

In a life where nothing seems real

In a world that's moving to fast

就如世界末日最后的舞

Anywere we may be
I will sing with you, a song...
So stay with me and hold me tight

Breathing a sheet of flame, it came

And in the clear white heat of dawn

zh: 龙之晨时光，城墙坍塌皆事

zh: 兄弟在骤然光芒中致意

They are not nice, they're mostly noise

zh: 他们骂如男子，行如孩儿

但每当我拥抱一人，一切开始

en: But every time I take one in my arms It starts:
The movie in my mind
The dream they leave behind
A scene I can't erase
And in a strong GI's embrace
Flee this life
Flee this place
The movie plays and plays
The screen before me fills
He takes me to New York
He gives me dollar bills
Our children laugh all day
And eat too much ice cream
And life is like a dream
The dream I long to find
I will not cry, I will not think
I'll do my dance, I'll make them drink
When I make love, it won't be me
And if they hurt me, I'll just close my eyes
They kill like men, they die like boys
The dream that fills my head
They give their cash, they keep their hearts
A man who will not kill
But every night again it starts
Who'll fight for me instead
He'll keep us safe all day
So no one comes at night
To blow the dream away
Dream
The dream I have to find
A world that's far away
Where life is not unkind

zh: 约翰，你很棒能单独见你吗

约翰，非常棒能否私下见你

你收到的这条新闻，只能告诉我

Kim. it's about Kim, isn't it?

正是恶梦里，遇见西贡安

Jesus, John, I am married

但是我们的报道通常可信
但我们的报告通常可信任
en: But our reports can usually be believed
Kim's a bar-girl in Bangkok
Pal, I know how you feel
It's too late! I have a whole new life

zh: 我有个爱妻，她不能离开我
我有我爱妻，她怎能离开我
en: I have a wife I love, she just can't disappear
Listen, guy, I know the shock you've had

zh: 并非总是糟，此地有答案啊
并不总糟糕，这有解决方法
并非总糟糕，此地有解决法
en: It isn't always bad, there are solutions here
Oh John, I never told her
My wife, how can I tell her?
A child, what do I do?
I shattered Kim now Ellen too
from this picture I keep
you, my parents, look out
and your smiles show no scorn
I am happy today
for I know what to do
and my heart is not torn
spirits know when to fly
when it's time
there's no reason to mourn
for the great sacred bird is reborn
from the ashes he'll rise
and upon his wide wings
I'll watch you from above
I will never be far
but my son, it's your turn
to know your father's love

zh: 现在我明白为何来世道
en: I know now why I came to this earth
it's so you find your place
but for that I must leave your embrace
you will be with your father now

zh: 将我离去，把全部爱给他
把我留下的爱全部给他

en: give all your love to him when I am gone
take one last look at me
don't forget what you see
for now you must move on
you will be who you want to be, you
can choose whatever heaven grants
as long as you can have your chance
I swear I'll give my life for you
no one will stop what I must do
my son, I'll give my life for you
John, is that you, buddy? Listen to me

他们认为我们会派海军陆战队，

zh: 据我所知，我们什么也没发
我们传来传去，无所事事啊

Buddy, are you there?

Sure! Time to fall in love!
John, listen fast, you did not get this call

zh: 毕竟，是你为我买下那个女孩
毕竟，是你给我买那女孩的人
你终究是给我买那女孩的人
en: You're the one who bought the girl for me after all
"Once you're a friend,
