When you are in trouble,
Then I'll cover for you
Not this time, the town's too hot
For one Kongai whore
Ol' buddy, I will not get you killed
She is no whore, you saw her too
She's really more, like... the April moon
April fuckin' moon!!
She's been hurt, you see
Both her parents died
What else could she be?
Sweet as that, and she's an orphan too!
How can a guy fight that?
You got one day, not two
Then be back!
Are you waiting for them to kill me?
Did you not get what he said?
There's a big screw loose inside you
I will rip it out of your head
That's a mad dog on the rampage
If you think he'll change - save your Breath

zh: 就答应吧，不管你心里爱他
就说同意，别管你爱不爱他
只要你答应，不在乎你爱他
en: Just say "Yes" - I don't care if you love Him
Princess, life has it all over death!
There is a secret
That you don't know
There is a force here
I never show
You say it's treason
To keep my vow
Season after season
I survived somehow
If you want a reason
I will show you now
Look, Thuy, this is my son
He has kept me alive
Now you see why
I must tell you "No"
This is the hour
This is our land
We found the power
In our brother's hand
And from a storm
Pierced with light
Fierce and white
The lightning came
A bright'ning flame
To end the night
One man to heed us -
Each girl, each boy
One voice to lead us
In a song of joy
This money's yours
Please take it all
Hey, you want more?
All the girls lie!
They just want to get out of here
Maybe you're not like that
But I don't know who you are

zh: 你想听听越南女孩的故事吗
想听一个越南女孩的故事吗
你想听更多越南女孩故事吗
en: Do you want one more tale of a Vietnam girl?

zh: 想知道我被束缚于不爱之人吗
想听我曾被束缚于不爱的人吗
en: Want to know I was bound to a man I don't love?

zh: 你想听我的村庄如何被焚烧吗
想知道我的村庄如何被烧毁吗
想知道我的村庄如何被焚毁吗
en: Do you want to be told how my village was burned?

zh: 想听听我的家人如何被摧毁吗
想听听我家人如何惨遭摧毁吗
你想听我家人如何惨遭不幸吗
en: Want to hear how my family was blasted away?

zh: 如何逃离稻田，目睹火海泪满布
我在稻田逃，见火中他们泪哭诉
逃离稻田，目睹火海，我心何所属
en: How I ran from the rice field and saw them in flames?

zh: 我的父母如何变成无脸之躯
我的父母已成尸骨，面目皆无
父母如何只剩躯，面庞皆消无
en: How my parents were bodies whose faces were gone?
I have had my fill of pain
I will not look back again
I would rather die
How would you like
Living with me?
It feels good like this
So that's how we should be
So would you like?
Yes, I would like!
Okay, it's set
No more to say
Screw the Engineer
You're the one good thing
That I've found out here
Why does Saigon never sleep at night?
Why does this girl smell of orange trees?
How can I feel good when nothing's right?
Why is she cool when there is no breeze?
You don't give answers, do you friend?
Just questions that don't ever end
Why God? Why today?
I'm all through here, on my way
There's nothing left here that I'll miss
Why send me now a night like this?
Who is the girl in this rusty bed?
Why am I back in a filthy room?
Why is her voice ringing in my head?
Why am I high on her cheap perfume?
Hey look I mean you no offense
But why does nothing here make sense?
Why God? Show your hand
Why can't one guy understand?
I've been with girls who knew much more
I never felt confused before
Why me? What's your plan?
I can't help her, no one can
I liked my mem'ries as they were
But now I'll leave rememb'ring her
When I went home before
No one talked of the war
What they knew from TV
Didn't have a thing to do with me
I went back and re-upped
Sure Saigon is corrupt
It felt better to be
Here driving for the embassy
'Cause here if you can pull a string
A guy like me lives like a king

zh: 只要你啥都不信，就没问题
只要你什么都不信，就没事
只要你什么都不信，就可以
en: Just as long as you don't believe anything
Why God? Why this face?
Why such beauty in this place?
But now I'll

zh: 我听说你在闯祸，弄得一团糟
我听说你在闯祸，搞得一团糟
en: I heared how you was kickin' up some capers

zh: 当我还远在，堪萨斯城,傲
en: When I was off in Kansas City, Mo.

zh: 我听说有些事不能登报
en: I heard some things you couldn't print in papers

zh: 那些人说他们什么都知道
那些人说话就像他们知道
en: From fellers who been talkin' like they know!

zh: 我只做了我该做的那些事，差不多
我只做了我该做的那种事，差不多
en: I only did the kind of things I orta, sorta,

zh: 对你我诚实得不能再诚实了
我对你最忠诚，全心全意为我
en: To you I was as faithful as c'n be fer me.

zh: 关于我失裤的传说，谣言罢了
en: Them stories 'bout the way I lost my bloomers - Rumors!

zh: 茶壶里的风暴，波澜壮阔
茶壶里的风暴波澜壮阔
茶壶里的风浪波澜壮阔
en: A lot of tempest in a pot o' tea!
I go and sow my last wild oat!
I cut out all shenanigans.
I save my money, don't gamble or drink
In the back room down at Flannigans!
I give up lotsa other things
A gentleman never mentions,
But before I give up anymore,
I wanta know your intentions!
With me it's all er nuthin'.
Is it all er nuthin' with you?
It cain't be "in between"
It cain't be "now and then"
No half and half romance will do!

zh: 我是个专一男，爱家安乐窝
我是个专一男，家庭守护者，
en: I'm a one woman man, Home lovin' type,
All complete with slippers and pipe.
Take me like I am, er leave me be!

zh: 若不能全给我，别给任何
en: If you cain't give me all, give me nuthin'
And nuthin's whut you'll git from me!
With you it's all er nuthin'.
All fer you and nuthin' fer me!

zh: 老婆要是聪明，得想得清楚
en: But if a wife is wise, she's gotta realize
That men like you are wild and free.

zh: 那我就不烦恼，不会皱眉，
那么我不烦躁，不会皱眉
en: So I ain't gonna fuss, ain't gonna frown,
Have your fun, go out on the town,
Stay up late and don't come home till three.

zh: 若你困了，便立刻去睡吧
若疲倦，便直接入睡去吧
若你困了就立刻去睡吧
en: And go right off to sleep if you're sleepy,
There's no use waitin' up fer me!

zh: 哎，农夫和牧人本该成好友
噢，农夫与牧人，理应成朋友
噢，农耕人与放牧人应成友，
哦，农民和牧人本应是朋友
哦，农民和牧民本应是朋友
哦，农夫和牛仔本该是朋友，
en: Oh, the farmer and the cowman should be friends,

zh: 看，农夫和牧场主应成好友
噢,农民和牧民应成为朋友
哦，农夫和牧牛人应成好友
哦，农夫与牧人本应是朋友
哦，农夫与牧人该成为朋友
噢，农民和牧人应成为朋友
en: Oh, the farmer and the cowman should be friends.
One man likes to push a plough,
The other likes to chase a cow,

zh: 但他们并非不能成朋友
但他们为何不能成朋友
但那无理由不成为朋友
en: But that's no reason why they cain't be friends.
Territory folks should stick together,
Territory folks should all be pals.
Cowboys dance with farmer's daughters,
Farmers dance with the ranchers' gals.
The cowman ropes a cow with ease,
The farmer steals her butter and cheese,
That's no reason why they cain't be friends

zh: 这个问题并非我不了解该做什么
并不完全是因为我不知该如何做
并非不知该做啥，只是心中矛盾多
en: It ain't so much a question of not knowin' what to do

zh: 我十岁起就明白是非对错
我十岁时就明白是非对错
自十岁起，我明了是非对错
en: I knowed what's right an' wrong since I been ten.

zh: 我听说许多故事，认为它们都是真的
我听过许多故事，觉得它们都是真的
我听见许多故事，觉得它们都是真的
en: I heared a lot of stories an' I reckon they are true

zh: 关于男人对女人的压迫
关于男人对女人的压迫
en: About how girls are put upon by men.
I know I mustn't fall into the pit

zh: 当我有个男友时，我忘了
但和伙计在一起，我忘了
en: But when I'm with a feller, I fergit!

zh: 我只是不能拒绝的女孩
我只是不会说不的女孩
我只是不会说不的女孩
en: I'm just a girl who cain't say 'No'
I'm in a terrible fix!
I always say 'Come on, let's go'
just when I oughta say 'Nix.'
When a person tries to kiss a girl

zh: 我知道她该扇他脸，帅太
我知道她该打他脸，帅太
en: I know she oughta give his face a smack!
But as soon as someone kisses me

zh: 我莫名也想亲亲他回来
我竟然也想亲吻他回来
en: I somehow sorta wanna kiss him back!
I'm just a fool when lights are low
I cain't be prissy an' quaint
I ain't the type that can faint
How can I be what I ain't?
I cain't say 'No!'

zh: 当有人开始调情，你会怎么做
当有人开始调情时该怎么做
遇到有人调情时，你会怎么做
en: Whatcha gonna do when a feller gets flirty
An' starts to talk purty
Whatcha gonna do?
Sposin' that he says
That your lips are like cherries,
Or roses, or berries?
That yer sweeter 'n cream
and he's gotta have cream or die?

zh: 他这么说时，你该怎么办
当他说这话时，你怎么办
他那样说时你会怎么办
en: Whatcha gonna do when he talks that way?
Spit in his eye?
I'm jist a girl who cain't say 'No',
Cain't seem to say it at all
I hate to disserpoint a beau
When he is payin' a call!

zh: 有段时间我假优雅，端庄
一会儿我曾优雅又凉爽
有时我表现得高雅时尚
en: Fer a while I ack refined and cool,
A settin on the velveteen setee
Nen I think of thet ol' Golden Rule,

zh: 为他做他愿为我做的事
为他付出他也会对我做，
为他做他愿为我做之事
en: And do fer him what he would do fer me!
I cain't resist a Romeo
In a sombrero and chaps
Soon as I sit on their laps
Somethin' inside of me snaps
I cain't say 'No'!
I'm jist a girl who cain't say 'No'
Kissin's my favorite food!
With or without the mistletoe
I'm in a holiday mood!
Other girls are coy an' hard to catch

zh: 但是其他女孩都不快乐
其他女孩不享受欢愉，哦
其他女孩没有开心时刻，
en: But other girls ain't havin' any fun!
Ev'ry time I lose a wrastlin' match

zh: 我有搞笑感，好像我赢了
总有种滑稽感觉我赢了
我有奇怪感觉，好像赢了
en: I have a funny feelin' that I won!
Though I can feel the undertoe
I never make a complaint
Till it's too late for restraint
Then when I want to, I cain't

zh: 二十分钟前，我像微风一样自由
二十分钟前，我像微风一样自由，
en: Twenty minutes ago I am free like the breeze,
Free like a bird in the woodland wild,

zh: 自由如吉普赛，如同孩子
如游民般自由，童真无忌
en: Free like a gypsy, free like a child,
I'm a happy man!
I'm unattached!

zh: 二十分钟前我随心所欲地做
二十分钟前我随心所欲得过
en: Twenty minutes ago I can do what I please,
Flick my cigar ashes on a rug,
Dunk with a donut, drink from a jug-

zh: 我忙着自己的事情，应该的
我只想照顾好自己的事情
en: I'm minding my own business like I oughter
Ain't meanin' no harm to anyone.

zh: 我正与一位农夫女儿聊天，
我和某位农民的女儿交谈
我正与一位农家姑娘聊天
en: I'm talking to a certain farmer's daughter-

zh: 然后我就看着枪口，面对危险
en: Then I'm looking into the muzzle of a gun!
It's getting so you cain't have any fun!

zh: 每个女儿都有拿枪的父亲
每个女儿都有持枪的父亲
每个女儿都有个持枪父亲
en: Every daughter has a father with a gun!
It's a scandal, it's an outrage!
How a gal gits a husband today!

zh: 若明月下稍有疏忽，就犯错
en: If you make one mistake when the moon is bright,
Then they tie you to a contract,
So you'll make it ev'ry night!
When her fambly surround you and say:

zh: 你们得让尼尔变得诚实可靠
你必须让娜尔变得正直诚实
让他们说服你，诚实对待内尔
en: "You gotta make an honest womern outta Nell!"

zh: 她让你逼她诚实，说瞎话无阻
en: To make you make her honest, she will lie like hell!
On our manhood, it's a blot!
Where is the leader who will save us?
And be the first man to be shot?

zh: 陷入困境，不到一年，真的
en: You're in a mess, and in less than a year, by heck!

zh: 你的肩头有个宝宝，给你脖子吹泡泡哦
肩上有个宝宝，正给你脖子上吹泡泡呢
你的肩上有宝宝，在你脖子上吹泡泡呢
en: There's a baby on your shoulder making bubbles on your neck!

zh: 公鸡在鸡笼里，比男人好过得多
鸡笼里的大公鸡过得比男人好
en: A rooster in a chickencoop is better off'n men.

zh: 他并非一只母鸡的专属之物
他不是一只母鸡的专属之物
en: He ain't the special property of just one hen!
When it's gonna be the day
We're gonna lead the liberation
And we will lead the way?
It's problem we must solve
We gotta start a revolution!

zh: 我在星期五抵达堪薩斯城
我到达堪萨斯城是星期五
我在星期五到达堪萨斯城
en: I got to Kansas City on a Frid'y

zh: 到周六我学了一些事和知
在周六我学到了一点东西
到了周六我学了一点东西
en: By Sattidy I larned a thing or two

zh: 因为那时我还没啥主意
因为那时我还一无所知
en: 'Coz up to then I didn't have an idy

zh: 未来世界究竟发生何事
当现代世界逐渐展现时
世界未来的模样，我未知
en: Of whut the modren world was comin' to!

zh: 我数了二十辆独行的气车啊
en: I counted twenty gas buggies goin' by theirsel's
Almost ev'ry time I tuk a walk.

zh: 当我把耳朵贴在贝尔电话
当我把耳朵贴近贝尔电话
当我把耳朵贴向贝尔电话，
en: 'Nen I put my ear to a Bell Telephone

zh: 一位陌生女子开始说话
en: And a strange womern started in to talk!

zh: 堪萨斯城一切都紧跟潮流
堪萨斯城一切都跟上时代
堪萨斯城一切都很现代化
en: Ev'rythin's up to date in Kansas City

zh: 他们已尽力地走得很远
他们走到尽头，已达极限
他们走得远，到达了极限
en: They've gone about as fur as they c'n go!

zh: 他们建了摩天大厦，高达七层楼
他们建造了一座七层摩天大楼
他们盖了栋七层高的摩天大楼
en: They went and built a skyscraper seven stories high,

zh: 高楼长势，约可长至十一楼
高楼耸立，犹如建筑终有秋
高楼七层，约莫长势如秋后
en: About as high as a buildin' orta grow.

zh: 在堪萨斯城，一切如梦幻般
堪萨斯城的一切如梦似幻，
堪萨斯城一切都似梦幻般
en: Ev'rythin's like a dream in Kansas City,

zh: 它比魔法灯笼展更好看
en: It's better than a magic lantern show!
Y' c'n turn the radiator on
Whenever you want some heat.
With ev'ry kind o' comfort
Ev'ry house is all complete.
You c'n walk to privies in the rain
And never wet your feet!

zh: 他们已经尽力走到最远
他们已走到所能走之远，
en: They've gone about as fur as they c'n go,

zh: 他们的大剧院叫做滑稽戏
en: They got a big theayter they call a burleeque.

zh: 花费五十美分，看精彩表演
只需五十美分，观精彩表演
五十美分，看一场精彩表演
en: Fer fifty cents you c'n see a dandy show.

zh: 美女中一个圆润又丰满，
en: One of the gals was fat and pink and pretty,

zh: 上圆下也圆，身材完美展
她上圆下也圆，如球一般
上下圆滚滚，曲线美无边
en: As round above as she was round below.
I could swear that she was padded
From her shoulder to her heel,
But latter in the second act
When she began to peel

zh: 她证明了她拥有的一切都是真实无比
她证明了她拥有的一切都是绝对真实
她证明所有她拥有的都是绝对真实的
en: She proved that ev'rythin' she had was absolutely real!

zh: 她尽了全力，走得那么远，
她能走多远就走了多远，
她尽力展露，舞动至极限
en: She went about as fur as she could go,
The floor creaks,
The door squeaks,

zh: 老鼠啃着扫把，独自在房梁
那里有只田鼠啃着扫帚晃
壁角有只田鼠啃着扫帚棒
en: There's a fieldmouse a-nibblin' on a broom.
And I set by myself
Like a cobweb on a shelf,
By myself in a lonely room.
But when there's a moon in my winder
And it slants down a beam 'cros my bed

zh: 树影开始在墙上跳舞，随着月光
en: Then the shadder of a tree starts a-dancin' on the wall

zh: 梦中舞动，心中欢喜无量
en: And a dream starts a-dancin' in my head.
And all the things that I wish fer
Turn out like I want them to be,

zh: 我比那聪明傲慢的牛仔强，
en: And I'm better than that Smart Aleck cowhand
Who thinks he is better'n me!
And the girl I want
Ain't afraid of my arms
And her own soft arms keep me warm.
And her long, yeller hair
Falls across my face
Jist like the rain in a storm!

zh: 老鼠开始啃扫帚，咯吱响
老鼠啃扫帚，声音吱吱响
小老鼠啃扫帚，忙得欢畅
en: And the mouse starts a-nibblin' on the broom.
And the sun flicks my eyes-
It was all a pack o' lies!
I'm awake in a lonely room...

zh: 我不会再梦见她的怀抱了
我不会再梦想她的怀抱了
我再也不幻想她的怀抱了
en: I ain't gonna dream about her arms no more!
I ain't gonna leave her alone!
Goin' outside
Git myself a bride
Git me a womern to call m
My own.

zh: 一个健康强壮的女人何必
为何健康强壮女子应哭泣，
健康的强壮女人何必哭泣
en: Why should a woman who is healthy and strong

zh: 她男人离去就哭泣像个婴儿
她男人离开就哭得像个婴儿
女人强健康，为何哭闹如婴儿
en: Blubber like a baby if her man's goes away?

zh: 那女人哭泣哀嚎说他做错事
哭泣又哀嚎，他对她做了错事
en: A weepin' an' a whalin' that he's done her wrong
That's one thing you'll never hear me say!

zh: 永不觉得失去的男人是众多男人中的唯一
从不觉得失去的男人是男人中的独一无二
绝不认为失去的男人是众多男人中的唯一
en: Never gonna think that the man I lose is the only man among men!

zh: 我一挥手，表明我不在意
我不屑一顾，轻轻拍手示
我轻弹指头表示不在意
en: I'll snap my fingers to show I don't care
I'll buy me a brand new dress to wear
I'll scrub my neck
And I'll brush my hair
And start all over again!
Many a new face will please my eye
Many a new love will find me
Never have I once looked back to sigh
Over the romance behind me

zh: 新日子将来临，我还未动弹
新的曙光将至，我尚无留恋
新日冉冉升起，我亦追随前
新日必将至，前程锦绣无忧
新的一天到来，我才会回首
新日将至，我所期待，无忧愁
en: Many a new day will dawn before I do!
Many a like lad may kiss and fly
A kiss gone by is bygone.
Never have I asked an August sky
"Where has last July gone?"
Never have I wandered through the rye
Wondering "where has some guy gone?"

zh: 许多个新日子在我前升起
en: Many a new day will dawn before I do.
Never have I chased the honeybee
Who carelessly cajoled me
Somebody jist as sweet as he
Cheered me and consoled me.
Never have I wept into my tea
Over the deal someone doled me
Many a new day will dawn
Many a red sun will set
Many a blue moon will shine
Before I do!
Brand new state, gonna treat you great!

zh: 给你带来大麦，胡萝卜和土豆，
en: Gonna give you barley, carrots and pertaters,
Pasture fer the cattle,
Spinach and termayters!

zh: 花草原上夏天虫飞舞间
en: Flowers on the prarie where the June bugs zoom,
Plen'y of air and plen'y of room,
Plen'y of room to swing a rope!
Plen'y of heart and plen'y of hope.

zh: 俄克拉荷马，风儿吹拂过平原来
俄克拉荷马，风扫平原如此壮哉
欧克拉何马，风吹过草原卷起来
en: Oklahoma, where the wind comes sweepin' down the plain
And the wavin' wheat can sure smell sweet
When the wind comes right behind the rain.

zh: 俄克拉荷马，每晚我和爱人坐聊天
俄克拉荷马，每晚我和爱人坐谈天
en: Oklahoma, Ev'ry night my honey lamb and I
Sit alone and talk and watch a hawk
Makin' lazy circles in the sky.
We know we belong to the land
And the land we belong to is grand!
And when we say
Yeeow! Ayipioeeay!
We're only sayin'
You're doin' fine, Oklahoma!
Oklahoma O.K.

zh: 草地上有，金黄光芒闪耀
草地上，有金黄光雾笼罩
草地上，金黄色光芒闪耀
en: There's a bright, golden haze on the meadow

zh: 玉米高如象眼，望向天际傲
玉米高如大象眼，直冲云霄
玉米高如象眼，欲与天比高
en: The corn is as high as an elephant's eye

zh: 高耸入云，仿佛要触碰到天遥
稻谷高如象眼，仿佛直冲云霄
en: And it looks like it's climbing clear up to the sky
Oh, what a beautiful mornin'
Oh, what a beautiful day
I've got a beautiful feelin'
Everything's goin' my way

zh: 所有的牛都像雕像站着，
所有牛儿像雕像般站着
所有的牛像雕像般站着
en: All the cattle are standin' like statues

zh: 它们不动头，看着我骑马过
它们头不动，看我骑马经过
它们站着不动看我骑马过
en: They don't turn their heads as they see me ride by

zh: 可是一只小棕马在眨眼示意我
但是一只小褐马儿眨眼示意我
en: But a little brown maverick is winkin' her eye

zh: 大地上的声音皆如旋律
世界的声音皆如歌儿绿
世间万物声响皆如旋律
en: All the sounds of the earth are like music

zh: 微风轻柔，无暇顾及绿树枝
en: The breeze is so busy it don't miss a tree

zh: 泪眼盈盈柳树笑，我却如痴
悲伤的垂柳对我嘲笑不已
en: And ol' weepin' willer is laughin' at me
Laurey and Women Chorus:
Out of your dreams and into his arms
You long to fly

zh: 不需埃及醒神香，便知心中所想
不必埃及仙丹，知晓缘由心中藏
en: You don't need Egyptian smelling salts to tell you why.
Out of your dreams and into the hush
Of fallin' shadows
When the mist is low
And stars are breakin' through
Then out of your dreams you'd go
Into a dream come true, oh!

zh: 下定决心，下定决心劳瑞，
定下决心，定下决心劳瑞，
明确决定，下定决心劳蕾，
en: Make up your mind, make up your mind laurey,
Laurey dear,
Make up your own, make up your own story,
Laurey dear!

zh: 古法老女儿不给你指引
en: Old pharaohs daughters won't tell you what to do

zh: 请听从，听从内心真实的声音
en: Ask your heart, whatever it tells you will be true
Out of my dreams and into your arms
I long to fly
I will come as evening comes
To world of waitin' sky
Out of my dreams and into the hush
Then out of my dreams I'll go
Into a dream with you...

zh: 他们为何编造我名与你相联的故事
他们为何编造关联你我名字的故事
en: Why do they think up stories that link my name with yours?

zh: 邻里为何整天在门后闲聊闲话
为什么邻居整天在门后说闲话
为何邻居整天在门后闲聊八卦
en: Why do the neighbors gossip all day behind their doors?

zh: 我知道一法可证其言皆非实
我知道一法证明他们言非实
我有一法证实他们所言非实
en: I know a way to prove what they say is quite untrue
Here is the gist,
A practical list of "don'ts" fer you.
Don't throw bouquets at me
Don't please my folks to much
Don't laugh at my jokes too much.
People will say we're in love.
Don't sigh and gaze at me.
Your sighs are so like mine.
Your eyes mustn't glow like mine
People will say we're in love!
Don't start collecting things
Give me my rose and my glove.
Sweetheart, they're suspecting things

zh: 有些人说你我一樣有過失，帅太
有些人说你和我一样有错，帅太
en: Some people claim that you are to blame as much as I

zh: 为什么你费力烤了我最爱的派
为何你费心烘焙我爱的樱桃派
你为什么费心烘焙我最爱的派
en: Why do you take the trouble to bake my fav'rite pie?

zh: 实现你心愿，我在树上刻我们名字
许下你心愿，我在树上刻字表心意，
en: Grantin' your wish I carved our initials on that tree,

zh: 只保留那份无私建议的一小块
en: Just keep a slice of all the advice you give so free.
Don't praise my charm too much
Don't look so vain with me
Don't stand in the rain with me
Don't take my arm to much
Don't keep your hand in mine
Your hand feels so grand in mine
Don't dance all night with me
'till the stars fade from above
They'll see it's alright with me
Pore Jud is daid,
Pore Jud Fry is daid,

zh: 全都聚集在他坟前哭泣
全都聚拢在他身旁哭泣
全都围在棺材旁边哭泣
en: All gather 'round his cawfin now and cry
He had a heart of gold
And he wasn't very old

zh: 哦，为何这样好人要离世
为何如此好人必须离世
为何这位好人必须离世
en: Oh why did such a feller have to die?
Pore Jud is daid

zh: 他看起来如此安详平和
他看起来如此平静祥和
他看上去如此宁静祥和
en: He's lookin' oh so peaceful and serene
He's all laid out to rest
With his hands acrost his chest

zh: 他指甲从未如此干净过
他指甲干净得从未有过
en: His fingernails have never been so clean!

zh: 大家，我们聚在一起，为我们的兄弟朱德弗哀叹
各位，我们聚在一起，感叹我们兄弟朱德·弗莱，
大家，我们聚集在此为惋惜哭泣兄弟朱德弗莱，
en: Folks, we are gathered here to moan and groan over our brother Jud Fry,

zh: 自縊在煙房繩上，人說他太悲催
en: who hung hisself up by a rope in his smokehouse

zh: 接着有些哭泣哀嚎，来自那些女人然后他说
然后，其中一些女人会哭泣哀嚎接着他会说
然后那些女人中有些会哭泣和哀嚎他会说
en: Then there'd be weepin' and wailin'... from some of those women. Then he'd say:

zh: 这里的土地上，朱德是被误解最深的人
在这土地上，Jud是个最被误解的人
这里的地盘上，朱德是最被误解的人了
en: Jud was the most misunderstood man in this here territory.

zh: 以前人们认为他是个丑恶的人，称他为
en: People used to think he was a mean ugly feller and they called

zh: 他被当作肮脏臭鼬和暴躁猪贼
他被称为肮脏臭鼬，讨厌偷猪贼
他是个肮脏臭鼬，又是顽固猪贼
en: him a dirty skunk and an ornery pig stealer

zh: 但那些真正了解他的人
但他们真正了解他的人
但那些真正了解他的人
en: But the folks that really knowed him.

zh: 他们深知他脏衣底下藏有善心
en: Knowed that beneath them two dirty shirts he always wore
There beat a heart as big as all outdoors
As big as all outdoors.
Jud Fry loved his feller man
He loved hes feller man

zh: 他喜欢空中的鸟和田野的野兽
他爱空中的鸟儿，田野里的野兽
他喜欢天空的鸟儿，田野的野兽
en: He loved the birds of the air and the beasts of the field.

zh: 他爱谷仓里的老鼠，害虫，和，他对待
en: He loved the mice and the vermin in the barns, and he treated

zh: 老鼠当朋友，那也没错他喜欢小孩子
老鼠同胞亲，这是对的他喜欢小孩子
老鼠视同辈，这是对的他疼爱小孩子
en: the rats like equals, which was right. And he loved little children.

zh: 他爱天下所有人和万物，无人可知
他对全世界的每个人都充满爱意
他爱全世界的人和事物，无人不知
en: He loved everybody and everything in the whole world!

zh: 唯独他从不显露，因此无人知晓这件事
en: Only he never let on, so nobody ever knowed it.
Pore Jud is Daid
Pore Jud Fry is daid

zh: 朋友们将哭泣，哀号四野
en: His friends'll weep and wail for miles around
The daisies in the dell
will give out a different smell

zh: 因为小蚯蚯在地下，所以
en: Because Pore Jud is underneath the ground.
A Candle lights his haid
He's layin' in a cawfin made of wood
And folks are feelin' sad
Cause they useter treat him bad

zh: 现在他们明白朋友永别了
en: But now they know their friend is gone for good

zh: 他看起来如此美，如此好
他看着如此美丽和可爱
他看着真漂亮，如此迷人
en: He's lookin' oh so purty and so nice
He looks like he's asleep,
It's a shame that he won't keep

zh: 但正值盛夏，冰已所剩无几
但现已夏日炎炎，冰损耗季
可夏天来临，冰却渐渐消逝
en: But it's summer and we're running out of ice.
When I take you out tonight with me,

zh: 宝贝，今晚我们要这样过
en: Honey, here’s the way it’s goin’ to be:

zh: 你将在一群雪白骏马后端坐
你将在一群纯白骏马后坐着
你将在一群雪白骏马后落座
en: You will set behind a team of snow- white horses
In the slickest gig you ever see!
Chicks and ducks and geese better scurry
When I take you out in the surrey,

zh: 我带你坐顶上有流苏的苏瑞马车，
en: When I take you out in the surrey with the fringe on top.
Watch thet fringe and see how it flutters
When I drive them high-steppin’ strutters—

zh: 人们窥探窗户缝隙，瞪大眼睛惊呆哦
他们窥探门缝偷看，眼睛瞪大瞪直了
en: Nosey-pokes’ll peek through their shutters and their eyes will pop!

zh: 车轮黄灿灿，内饰棕褐褐
轮子黄灿灿，内饰呈棕色
车轮黄灿灿，内饰呈棕色
en: The wheels are yeller, the upholstery’s brown,
The dashboard’s genuine leather,

zh: 伊辛玻璃窗帘，可顺畅滚落
配有可卷下透明帘的马车
en: With isinglass curtains y’ c’n roll right down

zh: 万一天气变化，准备好了
以防万一，天气变化莫测
en: In case there’s a change in the weather.
Two bright side lights winkin’ and blinkin’,
Ain’t no finer rig, I’m a-thinkin’;

zh: 若你执意坚守，那便别想换我这车
若你想保留，认为我愿换，那就错了
en: You c’n keep yer rig if you’re thinkin’ ’at I’d keer to swap

zh: 为了那闪亮小马车顶上带流苏的
en: Fer that shiny little surrey with the fringe on the top.
When we hit that road, hell fer leather,
Cats and dogs’ll dance in the heather,

zh: 鸟儿和青蛙一起唱，蟾蜍跳起舞
en: Birds and frogs’ll sing all together, and the toads will hop!

zh: 风儿吹响，我们欢歌笑语
en: The wind’ll whistle as we rattle along,
The cows’ll moo in the clover,

zh: 河水流轻语，荡漾轻柔歌曲
河水荡漾，低声轻唱悠扬曲
河流荡漾，轻声低语诉歌诉
en: The river will ripple out a whispered song,
And whisper it over and over:

zh: 你希望一直走下去，永远不会停驻
你可曾想，让时光永远流转不停驻
en: Don’t you wisht y’d go on ferever and ud never stop

zh: 在那闪亮小马车里，车顶还有流苏
在那闪亮的小苏瑞，顶上垂着流苏
那闪亮的小苏瑞车，顶部还有流苏
en: In that shiny little surrey with the fringe on the top?
I can see the stars gittin’ blurry
When we ride back home in the surrey,

zh: 慢慢驾驶有流苏的轻便马车回家
缓缓驾驶苏瑞回家，顶部缀着流苏
en: Ridin’ slowly home in the surrey with the fringe on top.
I can feel the day gittin’ older,
Feel a sleepy head near my shoulder,

zh: 低头，垂靠我肩膀，直到它倒下，扑通
点头，垂头靠近我肩，直至跌落，扑通
低头，靠近我的肩膀一直垂落，扑通
en: Noddin’, droopin’ close to my shoulder till it falls, kerplop!

zh: 太阳在山边游泳，光芒闪烁
en: The sun is swimmin’ on the rim of a hill,
The moon is takin’ a header,

zh: 正当我想着大地都静止了，
当我在想整个世界都静了，
正当我想着大地都安静了
en: And jist as I’m thinkin’ all the earth is still,
A lark’ll wake up in the medder…
Hush! You bird, my baby’s a-sleepin’—
Maybe got a dream worth a-keepin’.

zh: 噢你们马队，慢慢悄悄走轻移
慢马儿啊，仿佛得儿绿依事词
哇你们马队，慢慢小跑别焦急
en: Whoa! You team, and jist keep a-creepin’ at a slow clip-clop;

zh: 别急马车，顶上飘动的流苏也别急
en: Don’t you hurry with the surrey with the fringe on the top.
A collector’s piece indeed

zh: 每个细节都如她所言，啊
她所言之细节，毫厘不差
她所说，每个细节都无差
en: Every detail exactly as she said
She often spoke of you, my friend

zh: 你的丝绒衬里和铅制人偶啊
en: Your velvet lining and your figurine of lead

zh: 你们都逝去时，你还会演奏吗
你们都离世后，你还会弹奏吗
你们死后，你还会继续演奏吗
en: Will you still play when all the rest of us are dead?
No more talk of darkness,
Forget these wide-eyed fears.
I’m here,
nothing will harm you
my words will warm and calm you.
Let me be your freedom,
let daylight dry your tears.
with you, beside you,
to guard you and to guide you
Say you love me
every waking moment,
turn my head
with talk of summertime

zh: 说你需我陪伴你，时时刻刻
说你想要，我陪你，时时刻刻
en: Say you need me with you,now and always
promise me that all you say is true
that’s all I ask of you
Let me be your shelter,
let me be your light.
You’re safe:
No one can find you.
your fears are far behind you
All I want is freedom,
a world with no more night
and you always beside me
to hold me and to hide me

zh: 那就说，给我一份爱，一辈子
请与我共度一份爱，一辈子
en: Then say you’ll share with me one love ,one lifetime
Let me lead you
from your solitude
Say you need me with you
here, beside you
anywhere you go let me go too
Share each day with me, each night, each morning
You know I do
Love me
I must go
They'll wonder where I am
Wait for me, Raoul
Order your fine horses!
Be with them at the door!
And soon you'll be beside me!
You'll guard me, and you'll guide me
I gave you my music
made your song take wing
and now how you've repaid me:
denied me and betrayed me
He was bound to love you
when he heard you sing

zh: 说你愿与我共爱，共一生
答应我，一生的爱，陪伴我
和我共度一世情，一世走
en: Say you'll share with me one love, one lifetime
say the word and I will follow you
Share each day with me,
each night, each morning
You will curse the day you did not do
all that the Phantom asked of you!

zh: 戴上面具，纸脸游行队伍
en: Masquerade! Paper faces on parade

zh: 藏起你的脸，让世界永远找不到你
舞会遮住你的脸，世界永寻不到你
化装舞会别露脸，让世界找不到你
en: Masquerade! Hide your face so the world will never find you

zh: 假面舞会千面百态的面具
en: Masquerade! Every face a different shade

zh: 面具舞会四顾，身后又是新面具
假面舞会四顾，背后又有新面具
en: Masquerade! Look around, there's another mask behind you

zh: 化妆舞会黄笑绿，红舞依
en: Masquerade! Grinning yellows, spinning reds

zh: 舞会尽情享受，让眼前奇景惊艳你
en: Masquerade! Take your fill, let the spectacle astound you

zh: 面具舞会炽热眼神，回头率
化妆舞会炽热目光，回头率
en: Masquerade! Burning glances, turning heads

zh: 化妆舞会停驻凝望四周的笑意
en: Masquerade! Stop and stare at the sea of smiles around you
Masquerade! Seething shadows breathing lies

zh: 假面舞会蒙骗所有知道你的朋友
假面舞会你能骗过曾相识的朋友
en: Masquerade! You can fool any friend who ever knew you

zh: 假面舞会坏人脸，偷偷看
en: Masquerade! Leering satyrs, peering eyes

zh: 伪装奔跑躲藏，但面容仍紧追不舍
狂欢逃跑藏匿，但面容仍紧追不舍
en: Masquerade! Run and hide, but a face will still pursue you

zh: 小洛蒂想尽了所有，想无他
en: Little Lottie thought of everything and nothing

zh: 她的父亲向她许诺会送给她音乐天使啊
她的父亲向她保证，会送给她音乐天使啊
她的父亲向她保证会把音乐天使送给她
en: Her father promised her that he would sent her The Angel Of Music
Her father promised her
You were once my one companion
You were all that mattered
You were once a friend and father
Then my world was shattered
Wishing you were somehow here again
Wishing you were somehow near
Sometimes it seemed if I just dreamed
Somehow you would be here
Wishing I could hear your voice again
Knowing that I never would
Dreaming of you won't help me to do
All that you dreamed I could
Pulsing bells and sculptured angels
Cold and monumental
Seemed for you the wrong companions
You were warm and gentle
Too many years fighting back tears
Why can't the past just die?
Knowing we must say good bye
Try to forgive, teach me to live
Give me the strength to try

zh: 没有了回忆，静泪不再流
勿留恋过往，勿哀默泪流
没有了回忆，不再无声泪
en: No more memories, no more silent tears

zh: 再也不凝望消逝的岁月
不再凝望那些虚度岁月
无需再凝望荒废的岁月
en: No more gazing across the wasted years
Help me say good bye
Wandering child,
So lost, so helpless
Yearning for my guidance
Angel or father?
Friend or phantom?
Who is it there, staring?
Angel, oh, speak
What endless longings
Echo in this whisper!
Too long you've wandered in winter
Far from my fathering gaze...
Wildly my mind beats against you...
Yet your/the soul obeys...
Angel of Music,
I denied you!
Turning from true beauty!
Angel of Music!
My protecter!
Come to me strange Angel...

zh: 超过无法回头点，不回顾
无法回头之时，不再回顾
en: Past the point of no return, no backward glances

zh: 我们的幻想游戏已落幕
我们的幻想游戏已结束
我们的梦幻游戏已落幕
en: Our games Of make-believe are at an end

zh: 超脱假如和何时，无需抵抗
抛开若何时念头，无谓抵抗
超越何时或如果，无需抗拒
en: Past all thought of 'If' or 'When', no use resisting

zh: 放下杂念，任由梦想降临
抛弃杂念，任由梦想降临
抛开思绪，任由梦幻降临
en: Abandon thought and let the dream descend
What raging fire shall flood the soul?
What rich desire unlocks its door?
What sweet seduction lies before us?

zh: 超越无法回头界，最后的阈值
已过无法回头点，最后的门坎
在无法回返的点，最后的界限
无法回头的路上，最后的界限
en: Past the point of no return, the final threshold

zh: 我们将了解什么温馨秘密
en: What warm unspoken secrets will we learn?
Beyond the point of no return

zh: 你让我到这无言无话的时刻
你让我陷入无言以对的时刻
你让我在这话语尽头的时刻
en: You have brought me to that moment where words run dry

zh: 在那个言语消逝于寂静的时刻，静默
在那个言语消失于寂静的时刻，静默
en: To that moment where speech disappears into silence, silence

zh: 我来到这里，几乎不明白为何
我来到这毫不知情原因为何
en: I have come here hardly knowing the reason why

zh: 我心中已想象我们的身躯缠绵交织着
en: In my mind I've already imagined our bodies entwining

zh: 毫无防备，静默中我与你同在此刻
en: Defenseless and silent and now I am here with you

zh: 不再犹豫，我已决定，决定了
没有迟疑，我已决定，决定了
没有犹豫，我决定了，决定了
en: No second thoughts, I've decided, decided

zh: 已过无法回头点，现无法返回
en: Past the point of no return, no going back now

zh: 我们的爱情剧终于开始
我们的激情戏终于开始
我们激情戏剧终于开始
en: Our passion play has now at last begun

zh: 超越是非之想，终极问题
超越对错之分，最后问题
超越是非对错，最终问题
en: Past all thought of right or wrong, one final question

zh: 我俩需等多久才成一体
en: How long should we two wait before we're one?
When will the blood begin to race
The sleeping bud burst into bloom?

zh: 火焰何时终将我们吞噬
何时火焰终将我们吞噬
火焰何时终将我们吞噬
en: When will the flames at last consume us?
The bridge is crossed, so stand and watch it burn
We've passed the point of no return
Lead me, save me from my solitude

zh: 请说你愿我陪伴你左右
请让我爱你，陪伴你左右
说你想要我陪伴你左右
en: Say you'll want me with you here beside you

zh: 无论何处你往，同行我也，克丽斯汀这是我求
无论何地你行，我也同行，克丽丝那是我所求
无论你去何方，我也同行，克莉丝汀，我仅此求
en: Anywhere you go let me go too, Christine that's all I ask of

zh: 再次深入我黑暗绝望之牢狱
再入黑暗深渊，陷入绝望之苦
en: Down once more to the dungeon of my black despair!

zh: 我们坠入我的思绪牢狱
我们陷入我心灵的囹圄
下我们坠入心灵的牢狱
en: Down we plunge to the prison of my mind!

zh: 下步入黑暗，深处如地狱
下那路，陷入黑暗深如哭
下那路，深入黑暗如地狱
en: Down that path into darkness deep as hell!

zh: 我为何要让她承受你的罪孽
我为何要让她为你的罪承担
我为何替你承担她承担罪责
en: Why should I make her pay for the sins which are yours?
Order your fine horses now!

zh: 请举起你的手，与眼睛平齐
en: Raise up your hand to the level of your eyes!

zh: 现在只有克丽丝汀或能救你
唯有克丽丝汀或许才能救你
只有或许克里斯汀能拯救你
en: Nothing can save you now except perhaps Christine

zh: 为你悲惨命运曾流的泪变冷
为你悲惨命运流的泪水渐冷
为你悲苦命运曾流的泪变冷
en: The tears I might have shed for your dark fate grow cold,
and turn to tears of hate!

zh: 别了我的失意偶像假朋友
en: Farewell my fallen idol and false friend

zh: 带着希望，如今所有希望破碎
曾满怀希望，如今梦想已破碎
曾满怀期望，如今盼望已破碎
en: We had such hopes, and now those hopes are shattered!

zh: 回头已太迟，祷告和无用怜悯也已晚
回头已太迟，祷告和无用怜悯也太晚
en: Too late for turning back, too late for prayers and useless pity!
All hope of cries for help

zh: 任你选哪条路，都无胜算
任你选哪条路，胜算难全
en: For either way you choose, you cannot win!
So, do you end your days with me,
or do you send him to his grave?
Pitiful creature of darkness
What kind of life have you known?

zh: 上帝赐我勇气，让你知你伴不孤
上帝赐我勇气，让你知你非孤独
天赐我勇，让你懂，你非孤独无助
en: God give me courage to show you you are not alone
Too long he's preyed on us,

zh: 但如今已知，歌剧魅影就在那里
但如今已知，歌剧魅影就在其中
en: but now we know, the phantom of the opera is there
deep down inside!
Think of me
think of me fondly
When we've said goodbye
Remember me
every so often
Please promise me you'll try
On that day, that not so distant day
When you are far away and free
If you ever find a moment
Spare a thought for me
And though it's clear
Though it was always clear
That this was never meant to be
If you happen to remember
Stop and think of me
Think of August
When the world was green

zh: 别想那些本来可能的事
别想事情本可能的样子
别想事物本可能的样子，
en: Don't think about the way things might have been
Think of me waking
Silent and resigned
Imagine me
Trying too hard
To put you from my mind
Please say you'll think of me
Whatever else you choose to do
There will never be a day
When I won't think of you
Long ago
It seems so long ago
How young and innocent we were
She may not remember me
But I remember her
Flowers fade
The fruits of summer fade
They have their seasons
So do we
But please promise me
That sometimes you will think of me
Where in the world have you been hiding?
Really, you were perfect!
I only wish I knew your secret!
Who is this new tutor?
Father once spoke of an angel ...
I used to dream he'd appear ...
Now as I sing I can sense him ...
And I know he's here ...
Here in this room he calls me softly
somewhere inside hiding
Somehow I know he's always with me
He - the unseen genius
I watched your face from the shadows
Distant through all the applause
I hear your voice in the darkness,
yet the words aren't yours
Guide and guardian!
Grant to me your glory!
Hide no longer!
Secret and strange angel
"No,what I love best," Lotte said
Is when I'm asleep in my bed

zh: 音乐天使在我脑海里唱着歌
当音符天使在我脑海里唱歌
音乐天使在我脑海中唱着歌
en: And the Angel of Music sings songs in my head
Insolent boy, the slave of fashion
Basking in your glory
Ignorant fool, this brave young suitor
Sharing in my triumph
Angel, I hear you speak, I listen
Stay by my side, guide me
Angel, my soul was weak, forgive me
Enter at last, Master
Flattering child, you shall know me
See why in shadow I hide
Look at your face in the mirror
I am there inside
In sleep he sang to me,
in dreams he came
that voice which calls to me
and speaks my name
And do I dream again?
For now I find

zh: 歌剧魅影在我脑海闪现
歌剧魅影在我心中出现
歌剧院魅影现身在此间
en: the phantom of the Opera is there
inside my mind
Sing once again with me
our strange duet
My power over you
grows stronger yet
And though you turn from me,
to glance behind,

zh: 歌剧魅影在此，心中永驻
歌剧魅影在那里，你心里
歌剧魅影，此刻就在那里
en: the Phantom of the Opera is there
inside your mind
Those who have seen your face
draw back in fear
I am the mask you wear
It's me they hear
My spirit and your voice,
in one combined
He's there
The Phantom of the Opera

zh: 提防歌剧魅影，幽灵来犯
en: Beware the Phantom of the Opera
In all your fantasies,
you always knew
that man and mystery
were both in you
And in this labyrinth,
where night is blind,
inside your mind ...
I have brought you,
To the seat of sweet music's throne.

zh: 为这音乐王国，人人皆须敬音乐
音乐的王国，万物皆需敬拜音乐
en: To this kingdom where all must pay homage to music,
Music.
You have come here.
For one purpose and one alone.
Since the moment I first heard you sing,

zh: 我需要你与我一起，为我，歌唱
en: I have needed you with me to serve me, to sing,
For my music, my music

zh: 夜晚敏锐，感觉不断升级
en: Nighttime sharpens, heightens each sensation

zh: 黑夜唤醒了沉睡的想象力
暗夜搅动，唤起无尽想象力
黑暗涌动，唤醒无尽想象力
en: Darkness stirs and wakes imagination

zh: 寂静中感官放棄防衛，無聲無息
en: Silently the senses abandon their defenses

zh: 慢慢温柔，夜色展其华美
徐徐柔柔，夜舒展其光辉
en: Slowly gently, night unfurls its splendor
Grasp it sense it, tremulous and tender

zh: 请将脸儿远离刺眼的白昼光
把脸转向远离那耀眼的阳光，
请转过脸离开那刺眼白天光，
en: Turn your face away from the garish light of day

zh: 把思绪远离无情冰冷的光
把思绪远离冷漠无情的光
将思绪远离无情冷漠光芒
en: Turn your thoughts away from cold unfeeling light

zh: 倾听这夜晚的美丽乐章
聆听夜晚的旋律与乐章
聆听夜晚的乐曲声悠扬
en: And listen to the music of the night
Close your eyes
And surrender to your darkest dreams

zh: 洗净你过往生活的思绪
抛开过去生活，清除思绪
忘掉过去生活，清除思绪
en: Purge your thoughts of the life you knew before

zh: 闭上眼，让心灵开始飞翔
闭上眼，让心灵展翅飞翔
闭上眼让你的灵魂翱翔
en: Close your eyes let your spirit start to soar

zh: 你将活得如未曾经历过
你将如未曾活过般生活
你将过前所未有的生活
en: And you'll live as you've never lived before
Softly, deftly, music shall surround you

zh: 聆听，感受，音乐包围着你
倾听，感受，渐渐包围着你
en: Hear it, feel it, closing in around you

zh: 开启心灵，让幻想自由舒展
开阔心灵，让幻想自由舒展
开启心扉，让幻想自由飘散
en: Open up your mind, let your fantasies unwind

zh: 在这你知无法抵抗的黑暗
深知无法抵抗这无尽黑暗
en: In this Darkness which you know you cannot fight

zh: 夜幕降临，音乐中的黑暗
在这黑夜里，音乐的黑暗
夜幕降临，音乐之暗展现
en: The Darkness of the Music of the Night!

zh: 让你思绪漫游于陌生新世界
让你心智开启奇妙世界之旅
让心灵启程，穿越奇异新世界
en: Let your mind start a journey through a strange new world

zh: 抛开旧世界，心中无牵挂
忘掉你过去所知的一切
抛开过往世界一切思绪
en: Leave all thoughts of the world you knew before

zh: 放任心灵飞向渴望之地
让心灵带你去向往之地
en: Let your soul take you where you long to be
Only then can you belong to me
Floating, falling, sweet intoxication

zh: 碰我，信我，品味每种感觉
碰我，信我，享受每个感觉
触我，信我，品味每种感受
en: Touch me, trust me, savor each sensation

zh: 让梦开始，释放你内心的黑暗之力，感受我创作的音乐之力，夜色中的音乐魔力
en: Let the dream begin, let your darker side give in To the power of the music that I write The Power of the Music of the Night
You alone can make my song take flight
Help me make the music of the night
I remember there was mist...

zh: 湖上弥漫着旋转的雾气
湖面弥漫着朦胧的雾气
en: Swirling mist upon a vast glassy lake
There were candles all around,
and on the lake there was a boat
And in the boat there was a man
Who was that shape in the shadows?
Whose is the face in the mask?
This loathesome gargoyle

zh: 燃烧地狱，却暗地里渴望天堂
en: Who burns in hell, But secretly yearns for heaven
Secretly, secretly...
Fear can turn to love

zh: 学会看，发现那怪兽后的男子
学会看，揭开怪物背后的男子
学会看见，揭开怪兽后的男子
en: You'll learn to see, to find the man behind the monster
This repulsive carcass

zh: 看似猛兽，暗藏向往美好心思
en: Who seems a beast but secretly dreams of beauty,
Like yellow parchment is his skin ...

zh: 巨大的黑洞如同未成长鼻子……
en: A great black hole served as the nose which never grew ...
You must be always on your guard,

zh: 若不然，他的魔法套索抓住你
若不然，他用神奇套索抓住你
否则他将用神奇套索抓住你
en: Or he will catch you with his magical lasso!
Those who speak of what they know find,
Too late, that prudent silence is wise.
Joseph Buquet, hold your tongue

zh: 他的炽热目光将焚尽你
他的眼神灼热，将燃尽你
他将以炽热目光灼烧你
en: He will burn you with the heat of his eyes!
Why have you brought me here?
We must return
My God, who is this man?
Who hunts to kill
I can't escape from him
I never will
Raoul, I've been there,
to his world of unending night
To a world where the daylight
dissolves into darkness, darkness
Raoul, I've seen him,
can I ever forget that sight?
Can I ever escape from that face?
So distorted, deformed
It was hardly a face,
in that darkness, darkness

zh: 但那声音注入我灵魂，奇妙甜美嗯
他的声，填满我心中奇异甜蜜声，嗯
en: But his voice filled my spirit with a strange, sweet sound

zh: 在夜下，心中有曲美妙音
那晚夜，我心里有旋律嗯
那夜晚，心在音乐中沉浸
en: In that night, there was music in my mind

zh: 穿越音乐，心灵开始翱翔
音乐中我灵魂开始翱翔
音乐引领我的灵魂飞翔
en: And through music my soul began to soar

zh: 我聆听前所未闻的声音
en: And I heard as I'd never heard before

zh: 然而他眼中尽是世间悲苦
他眼中藏尽了世间的忧苦
en: Yet in his eyes all the sadness of the world
Those pleading eyes, that both threaten and adore

zh: 从我们降临地球那一天
我们降临地球的那一天
en: From the day we arrive on the planet
And blinking step into the sun

zh: 世上美景无尽头，永不尽览
有太多美景无法一一看遍
en: There's more to see than can ever be seen
More to do than can ever be done
There's far too much to take in here
More to find than can ever be found

zh: 但阳光照耀蓝天，万物旋转
但太阳高悬在蓝色苍穹间
但是阳光高悬在蓝天之间
en: But the sun rolling high through the sapphire sky
Keeps great and small on the endless round
It's the circle of life,
and it moves us all
through despair and hope,
through faith and love
Till we find our place
on the path unwinding
In the circle,
the circle of life
I can see what's happening
And they don't have a clue

zh: 他们将会相爱，这就是事实
en: They'll fall in love and here's the bottom line
Our trio's down to two
The sweet caress of twilight
There's magic everywhere

zh: 这浪漫气息中充满魔力
充满浪漫气息的环境里
充满浪漫气氛，到处都是
en: And with all this romantic atmosphere
Disaster's in the air
Can you feel the love tonight
The peace the evening brings

zh: 世界一度达成完美和谐
世上一片宁静，和谐无界
世界此刻圆满和谐无缺
en: The world for once in perfect harmony
with all its living things
So many things to tell her
But how to make her see
The truth about my past
She'd turn away from me
He's holding back he's hiding
But what I can't decide

zh: 他为何不为王，我知其身
en: Why won't he be the king I know he is
the king I see inside
You needn't look too far
Stealing through the night's uncertainties
Love is where we are
And if he feels the love tonight
In the way I do

zh: 这已足够让这不安游子
en: It's enough for this restless wanderer
just to be with you
He lives in you
He lives in me
He watches over
Everything we see
Into the water
Into the truth
In your reflection
There's a calm surrender
to the rush of day
When the heat of a rolling wind
can be turned away
An enchanted moment,
and it sees me through

zh: 这份宁静足够躁动战士
知足的勇士只需陪伴你
这已足够于这不安战士
en: It's enough for this restless warrior
And can you feel the love tonight
It is where we are

zh: 足够这位惊奇的旅人了
en: It's enough for this wide-eyed wanderer
That we got this far
How it's laid to rest
It's enough to make kings and vagabonds
Believe the very best
There's a rhyme and reason
to the wild outdoors

zh: 流星旅途者之心跳动，与你心跳同步
当命运多舛的漫游者心跳与你同步
当这命运多舛的旅人心跳与你同步
en: When the heart of this star-crossed voyager beats in time with yours

zh: 这是一份荣誉和特权，我履行的职责
这是一份荣誉和特权，我肩负的职责
这是一种荣誉和特权，我履行的职责
en: It's an honor and a privilege, a duty I perform

zh: 以礼为尊，自豪履行职责
谨遵礼数，自豪履行职责
en: With due sense of decorum and with pride

zh: 谦卑敬意深深，常态中体现无边
尊敬有加，礼貌至上，习惯成自然
恭敬尊重为常态，非常符合规范
en: With deference and great respect very much the norm

zh: 恭敬之余，还略带马屁之嫌
逢迎拍马屁，旁边有一点点
en: Plus a hint of sycophancy on the side

zh: 向君主陈述他统治下的所有事实
将我君主面前呈现国家全部事实
揭示臣仆眼前，陛下世界诸般情势
en: To lay before my ruler all the facts about his realm

zh: 向他通报所有恶劣消息
为他报备所有恶劣消息
为他汇报所有凶恶之事
en: To fill him in on all the beastly news

zh: 猴子发狂了，长颈鹿依旧泰然处之
en: Chimps are going ape, giraffes remain above it all

zh: 大象记忆犹新，我却记不得那事
大象记忆犹新，我却无法回忆起
en: Elephants remember, though just what I can't recall

zh: 鳄鱼正在疯狂抢购银行的新报价
银行提供新优惠，鳄鱼们争相抢购
鳄鱼们正忙着从银行获取新报价
en: Crocodiles are snapping up fresh offers from the banks

zh: 对我金蛋感兴趣，但我迅速说不，谢谢
对我的金蛋感兴趣，但我迅速说不谢
en: Showed interest in my nest egg but I quickly said "No thanks!"

zh: 我们尚未支付犀鸟，而秃鹰已有预感
我们未付钱给犀鸟，秃鹫察觉有预感
我们未曾付费鹳鸟，秃鹰们有所预感
en: We haven't paid the hornbills and the vultures have a hunch

zh: 并非所有受邀者会回来共进午餐
并非所有受邀的人都会回来用餐
并非每个受邀者，都会回来吃午餐
en: Not everyone invited will be coming back for lunch
This is the morning report
Gives you the long and the short
Every grunt, roar, and snort
Not a tale I distort
The buffalo have got a beef
About this season's grass

zh: 土豚尝试储气，却遭挫折无功告
野猪们想储气，无奈一再受阻挠
疣猪想储气受阻挠，挣扎在泥沼
en: Warthogs have been thwarted in attempts to save their gas

zh: 火烈鸟粉色中，追逐秘书鸟嬉戏傲
火烈鸟在粉红湖，追逐文员鸟儿闹
粉红火烈鸟展翅，追逐秘书鸟翔翱
en: Flamingoes in the pink and Chasing secretary birds

zh: 我将成为强大国王，敌人啊小心吧
我将成为强大国王，敌人小心啊哈
我将成为强大王者，敌人们小心吧
en: I'm gonna be a mighty king, so enemies beware!
I've never seen a king of beasts
With quite so little hair
I'm gonna be the mane event
Like no king was before
I'm brushing up on looking down
I'm working on my roar
No one saying do this
No one saying be there
No one saying stop that
No one saying see here
Free to run around all day
Free to do it all my way!
I think it's time that you and I
Arranged a heart-to-heart
Kings don't need advice
From little hornbills for a start

zh: 若此为王朝走向，我毋需留
en: If this is where the monarchy is headed
Count me out
Out of service, out of Africa
I wouldn't hang about
Everybody look left
Everybody look right
Everywhere you look
I'm--Standing in the spotlight
It's so incredible
That you're so rude
When you're so edible
When you are food
I'm chompin'at the bit baby
My stomach's on the growl son
You both been invited on a date

zh: 上菜了，双份佳肴盘里搁
en: Two courses handed to us on a plate
We'll have you raw won't be long to wait
Seeing you're already brown
Your ribs are looking so tasty
Such chewy little chops chums
Now wasn't it her mom who ate your dad
And having parents eaten makes us mad

zh: 我们要稍加算算这笔账
我们就要稍微算算旧账
我们要稍微算一算旧账
en: We're gonna settle up the score a tad

zh: 从未尝过如此知名零食
从未尝过如此盛名小食，
en: We've never had a snack of such renown

zh: 我们从头开始享用美食
en: I think we should begin the meal from scratch

zh: 那么多美味部分要分离
如此多美味部分需剥离
那么多鲜美部分要分离
en: So many juicy segments to detach

zh: 为你善良如金，因你已如琢石
对你好如金，你已如刻之宝石
en: Be good as gold for you're as good as carved
We're starved
Night
And the spirit of life calling
And a voice
With the fear of a child asking
Wait
there's no mountain too great
hear these words and have faith
have faith
they live in you
they live in me
they are watching over
everything we see
in every creature
in every star
in your reflection
I never thought hyenas essential
They're crude and unspeakably plain

zh: 可能它们有一点潜力闪现，
或许它们有一丝潜力显现
或许它们有一丝潜力闪现
en: But maybe they've a glimmer of potential
If allied to my vision and brain
I know that your powers of retention
Are as wet as a warthog's backside
But thick as you are, pay attention
My words are a matter of pride
It's clear from your vacant expressions
The lights are not all on upstairs
But we're talking kings and successions

zh: 就连你也无法察觉意外
就算你也无法逃脱意外
即便你也无法避免意外
en: Even you can't be caught unawares

zh: 准备迎接一生中的良机
en: So prepare for a chance of a lifetime
Be prepared for sensational news
A shining new era
Is tiptoeing nearer
I know it sounds sordid
But you'll be rewarded
When at last I am given my dues!
It's great that we'll soon be connected

zh: 拥有永世受人敬仰之君
en: With a king who'll be all-time adored
Of course, quid pro quo, you're expected
To take certain duties on board

zh: 未来充满奖励，机会无边
未来遍布奖励，机会无限
未来充满奖赏，遍布眼前
en: The future is littered with prizes
And though I'm the main addressee
The point that I must emphasize is
You won't get a sniff without me!

zh: 准备迎接这次世纪政变
时刻准备迎接世纪政变
世纪政变，务必做好防范
en: So prepare for the coup of the century
Be prepared for the murkiest scam

zh: 一丝不苟计划，坚持不懈跨越，否认数十年
en: Meticulous planning, tenacity spanning, decades of denial

zh: 仅以成为无可争议的国王，受尊敬，受敬礼
en: Is simply why I'll Be king undisputed, respected, saluted
And seen for the wonder I am

zh: 哈库納馬塔塔多美好的短語
哈库纳马塔塔多美好的短语
哈库纳马塔塔多美妙的词句
en: Hakuna Matata! What a wonderful phrase

zh: 无忧无虑这句奇妙的词语
en: Hakuna Matata! Ain't no passing craze

zh: 意味着你的日子无忧无虑
这表示你的余生无忧无虑
这意味着你余生无忧无虑
en: It means no worries for the rest of your days
It's our problem-free philosophy

zh: 他发现自己的气息缺乏吸引力
他发现他的气味缺乏某种魅力
他发现他的气味缺了些吸引力
en: He found his aroma lacked a certain appeal

zh: 他每餐后都能驱散草原香气
每餐后他能让草原恢复生机
他餐餐后皆能驱散草原气息
en: He could clear the savannah after every meal

zh: 我心裡敏感，卻看似皮厚無感
看似厚重躯壳，内心敏感柔软
我看似坚强，实则敏感于心间
en: I'm a sensitive soul though I seem thick-skinned

zh: 痛的是我，朋友从未顺风站
朋友不靠风站，让我心受寒
en: And it hurt that my friends never stood downwind
And oh, the shame
Thought of changin' my name
Yeah you're our savior thanks a bunch
But how about some lunch
It doesn't matter if it's fresh
I need a fix of flesh

zh: 我的骨头已移至未知之地
en: My bones have moved to where they've never been
They are on the outside looking in
Are you blaming me
Oh no it's the lionesses
You are so adored
I'm better than mufasa was
I'm revered
I am reviled
I'm idolized
I am despised
I'm keeping calm
I'm going wild
She's got those assets feminine
I have to make her mine
Nobility in every gene
She has to be my queen
You're the king control the hyenas
You're destroying the pridelands
If we don't stop now don't you see

zh: 仍有机会一切变回原来的样子
en: There's still a chance for things to be all right again
Come sweet nala
It's written in the stars
We'll create a host of little scars
Tell me I'm adored
Where has the starlight gone?
Dark is the day
How can I find my way home?
Home is an empty dream
You promised you'd be there
Whenever I needed you
Whenever I call your name
You're not anywhere
I'm trying to hold on
Just waiting to hear your voice
One word, just a word will do
To end this nightmare
When will the dawning break
Oh endless night
Sleepless I dream of the day
When you were by my side
Guiding my path
Father, I can't find the way
I know that the night must end
And that the sun will rise
I know that the clouds must clear
And that the sun will shine

zh: 听我讲述深海无尽蓝故事
我要讲述个无尽蓝的故事
给你讲个无底蓝海的故事
en: I'll tell you a tale of the bottomless blue
And it's hey to the starboard, heave ho!

zh: 勇水手，小心，因为大事将至
en: Brave sailor, beware, 'cause a big 'uns a-brewin'
Mysterious fathoms below!

zh: 我要为你唱首海之王的歌
我为你唱首海洋之王的歌
为你唱一首海洋国王之歌
en: I'll sing you a song of the king of the sea

zh: 海洋之主，他就是那统治者
他是统治所有大海的王者
海洋之主，他是那位统治者
en: The ruler of all of the oceans is he
In mysterious fathoms below!
Fathoms below, below!
From whence wayward westerlies blow!
Where Triton is king
And his merpeople sing
The salt on your skin
And the wind in your hair
And the waves as they ebb and they flow!
We’re miles from the shore
And guess what, I don’t care!

zh: 为你唱一首大海之王的歌
为你唱一首海洋之主的歌
我将为你歌唱海洋之王者
en: I’ll sing you a song of the king of the sea
An’ it’s hey to the starboard, heave ho!
The king of the ocean gets angry
An’ when he gets angry, beware!

zh: 我提醒你，孩子，特里顿王生氣
我告訴你，小伙，特里同王生氣
en: I’m tellin’ ya, lad, when King Triton is mad
How the waves’ll buck, rock to and fro!

zh: 海底无尽蓝中，有美人鱼出没
en: There’s mermaids out there in the bottomless blue

zh: 注意他们，小子，否则你会遭殃的
en: Watch out for ‘em, lad, or you’ll go to your ruin

zh: 在别人的湖泊里，海藻总是更绿的
en: The seaweed is always greener In somebody elses lake
You dream about going up there
But that is a big mistake
Just look at the world around you
Right here on the ocean floor
Such wonderful things surround you
What more is you lookin for?
Under the sea, Under the sea
Darling its better
Down where its wetter
Take it from me
Up on the shore they work all day
Out in the sun they slave away

zh: 当我们全心投入于漂浮在海底时
当我们全心全意地漂浮在海底时
在我们全心全意漂浮海底的同时
en: While we devotin Full time to floatin Under the sea
Down here all the fish is happy
As off through the waves they roll
The fish on the land aint happy
They sad cause they in their bowl
But fish in the bowl is lucky
They in for a worser fate
One day when the boss get hungry
Guess whos gon be on the plate
Nobody beat us
Fry us and eat us
We got no troubles
Life is the bubbles
Since life is sweet here
We got the beat here
Even the sturgeon an the ray
They get the urge and start to play

zh: 我们有精神，你要听听看
我们有激情，你得听听看
我们有精神，你得听听看
en: We got the spirit, You got to hear it

zh: 当沙丁鱼开始跳贝圭恩，音乐给我
en: When the sardine begin the beguine its music to me
What do they got? A lot of sand
We got a hot crustacean band

zh: 每个小蛤蜊都在这玩耍
en: Each little clam here know how to jam here

zh: 小小蛞蝓在此，欢舞此地
en: Each little slug here Cuttin a rug here

zh: 每个小蜗牛，都懂得唱歌儿
en: Each little snail here Know how to wail here

zh: 因此水下更热，充满活力
所以水下热，更绿更多姿
原因就在水下更热那里
en: Thats why its hotter Under the water

zh: 我承认过去我曾是个不良人
我承认过去我曾经是个坏人
我承认过去我曾是个恶毒人
en: I admit that in the past I've been a nasty

zh: 他们没开玩笑，称呼我，呀，女巫
他们没开玩笑，称我为，呃，女巫
en: They weren't kidding when they called me, well, a witch
But you'll find that nowadays
I've mended all my ways

zh: 悔改了，见光明，焕然变新
en: Repented, seen the light, and made a switch

zh: 我恰好有幸略懂一点魔法
幸好我了解一点魔法技巧
幸运的是，我略懂一点魔法
en: And I fortunately know a little magic

zh: 我拥有这天赋，一直伴随着我
我拥有这份天赋，一直携带着
我有这份天赋，一直伴随着我
en: It's a talent that I always have possessed
And here lately, please don't laugh
I use it on behalf

zh: 那些痛苦的人，孤独的，忧郁的
痛苦中可怜人，孤零零，忧郁多
那些痛苦的人，孤独的，沮丧的
en: Of the miserable, the lonely, and depressed

zh: 痛苦不幸的人们，需求多
en: Poor unfortunate souls In pain, in need

zh: 可怜的不幸灵魂，悲伤，真实
en: Those poor unfortunate souls, So sad, so true
They come flocking to my cauldron
Crying, "Spells, Ursula, please!"
And I help them, Yes I do!
Now, it's happened once or twice
Someone couldn't pay the price

zh: 恐怕我不得不让他们受罚
恐怕我要让他们跨过煤渣
en: And I'm afraid I had to rake 'em 'cross the coals
Yes, I've had the odd complaint
But on the whole I've been a saint
To those poor unfortunate souls

zh: 那些男人不喜欢闲聊太多
那里的男人不喜欢闲话多，
en: The men up there don't like a lot of blabber

zh: 他们认为闲聊女孩太无聊
他们觉得闲聊的女孩无聊
他们认为八卦女孩很无聊
en: They think a girl who gossips is a bore!

zh: 在陆上，女士们更喜欢保持沉默
在陆地上，女士们最好保持沉默
在陆地上，女士们最好保持沉默
en: on land it's much preferred for ladies not to say a word

zh: 毕竟呢，亲，闲聊有什么用呢
en: And after all, dear, what is idle prattle for?

zh: 他们并不都对言谈感到惊艳
他们不太看重谈吐，不喜言谈
en: they're not all that impressed with conversation

zh: 真正的绅士能避则避言
真正的绅士能避则避谈
真正的绅士能避则避言，
en: True gentlemen avoid it when they can

zh: 但他们迷醉倾心，沉迷于寡言女子
但他们宠爱痴迷在内敛淑女身上
en: But they dote and swoon and fawn On a lady who's withdrawn

zh: 能守住嘴，女人能得心安
她守口如瓶，赢得男人欢
守口如瓶她，赢得男人欢
en: It's she who holds her tongue who gets a man
Come on you poor unfortunate soul
Go ahead! Make your choice!
I'm a very busy woman
And I haven't got all day
It won't cost much, Just your voice!

zh: 可怜的不幸者，悲哉，真矣
en: You poor unfortunate soul, It's sad, but true
If you want to cross the bridge, my sweet
You've got the pay the toll
Take a gulp and take a breath
Go ahead and sign the scroll!
Now look at me
You see this face

zh: 在美丽方面我一塌糊涂
在美貌方面，我一塌糊涂
关于美貌，我是一塌糊涂
en: In terms of beauty I'm a basket case
And as for style and savoir faire
Well I guess there ain’t A whole lot there
In fact all three
without a doubt
Mister David brains
were handed out
That’s why we sounds
Like thers knowledge
In our noodle
And once you learned that word
There ain’t nothing you can do

zh: 让那正能量助你一臂之力
就让那积极能量为你效力
让那积极的力量为你效力
en: So let that Poositrocity Work for you!
Oh! Just look!
It's like I'm in a storybook!
Oh! It's bliss!
I dreamed that it would be
Look over there!
Oh my god! How very odd!
And what might they be?
Something splendid, maybe!
Look over here!
Could you bust?

zh: 真是令人眼花，瞠目结舌的惊奇
en: Isn't it just Bedazzling, dazing Utterly amazing!
Gazing 'round, it's like, to die!
Just seeing it feels so good
I'd scream if I only could!

zh: 我一直盼望着并期待能在这里
我曾盼望着，期望如此地在这里
我一直渴望期盼着能来到这里
en: I'd hoped and wished And wanted so to be here

zh: 祈祷盼望，计划得当，如诗
en: Wished and prayed And planned it to a "t"
Prayed and wow!
Just look- it's really me here!
Walking around, strange as it seems
Somewhere beyone my wildest dreams!

zh: 曾希望并祈祷，在此处我会做什么
盼望且许愿，好奇这里会做些什么
期待与愿望，我在这里会做什么呢
en: I'd hoped and wished And wondered what I'd do here

zh: 祈盼祷告，想象所见景象
心想事成，祈求憧憬所见
许愿祈祷，想象所见之景
en: Wished and prayed And pictured what I'd see
My prayers are coming true here!
Look at it all, look how it gleams!
Lovely beyond my wildest dreams
Look, it's him!
So handsome and refined and slim

zh: 好，真诚，从头到脚美啊哈夏
甜，真挚，从头到脚瑰丽无瑕
看，他甜真，从头到脚华丽啊
