I'd hoped and wished
My life would feel enchanted!

zh: 祈求命运能听到我的请求
许愿祈祷命运聆听我求救
希望祈禱，命運聽我的懇求
en: Wished and prayed The fates would hear my plea

zh: 祈求祈，愿望应验超所求
祈祷成真，愿望超乎所求
en: Prayed and wow! My prayers are more than granted!
Look at it all, hall after hall
Perfect as you could please here!
Marvels galore, and even more
did I mention he's here?
And if all of it goes
Past even these extremes
Just look at me and you will see
Someone beyond her wildest dreams!
How I love les poissons
Love to chop and to serve little fish
First I cut off their heads
Then I pull out the bones
With the cleaver I hack them in two
I pull out what's inside
And I serve it up fried
God, I love little fishes, don't you?

zh: 为你献上一道美味佳肴，采用经典技艺烹调
en: Here's something for tempting the palate, prepared in the classic technique

zh: 先将鱼敲平，槌子用力敲
en: First you pound the fish flat with a mallet
Then you slash through the skin
Gives the belly a slice
Then you rub some salt in
'Cause that makes it taste nice
Who needs words
Dancing beats small talk any day
It's the way your feet smile or laugh
It lets you say so many things

zh: 舞蹈是种感触大于听闻的语言
舞蹈是一种感受而非听的语言
舞蹈是一种无声胜有声的语言
en: Dancing is a language that is felt instead of heard
You can whisper sing or shout
Without so much as a word

zh: 让情感指引，身体自然知所求
en: Just let your emotions tell your body what to do

zh: 看手势可以展示多少心意
观察手势透露的情感秘密
注意一个动作有多能展现
en: See how much a single gesture can reveal

zh: 每一步，小小步，步步向心头
每一步小小步，每个独自行
en: And every little step, every single step

zh: 走进你内心，道出真实感受
这步更接近表达你的感受
en: Is one step closer to saying what you feel

zh: 音乐一响起，抱负消逝，勇敢前行
音乐触动你心弦，抱负烟消云散，
音乐响起时，雄心壮志瞬息消散
en: Once the music hits you and ambitions fall away

zh: 你就发现你说出心中难言之语
en: And you find that you're expressing things your voice daren't say
Don't be afraid let go
Soon as you surrender
What's inside will sweep on through

zh: 当我们之间的界限逐渐消失
当我们之间的界限消失不见
当我们之间的界限渐渐消失
en: As the boundaries raised between us disappears

zh: 每一步，每一个小小的脚步
每一步，每一个微小的脚步
每一步都迈，每步都更稳固
en: And every little step every single step

zh: 离大声清晰说话更近一步
en: Is one step closer to talking loud and clear

zh: 舞蹈就像一场对话，不需要发出声音，一旦开始
跳舞就像一场对话，无需发出声响儿绿依事词
en: A dance is like a conversation except you never need to make a sound
And once you've begun

zh: 你们共舞如对话，来来回回，旋转不息
舞若对话，无言语，来来去去，旋转不息
舞如对话不需言，来来去去，周而复始
en: You speak as one give and take, Back and forth, Round and round

zh: 舞蹈就像一场对话，你的嘴唇永远不需要分开
舞蹈像是一场言语交流，但你的嘴唇无需分离
跳舞就像一场对话，只是你的嘴唇不需要分开
en: A dance is like a conversation except your lips don't ever need to part

zh: 你会合一，颊相亲，足相亲，心相亲
你会齐声，颊贴颊，脚碰脚，心贴心
将会一体，脸贴脸，脚碰脚，心贴心
en: You'll speak as one, Cheek to cheek, Toe to toe, Heart to heart

zh: 但舞蹈表达力，超越言语多
en: But it says much more than language ever could

zh: 每一步都离被理解更近了
那一步，又更接近被理解了
en: Is one step closer to being understood

zh: 你看到她，坐在那头的路旁
那边见她，对面坐着的姑娘
你看见她，静坐对面的远方
en: There you see her, sitting there across the way
She don't got a lot to say
But there's something about her
And you don't know why
But you're dying to try
You wanna kiss the girl
Yes you want her
Look at her you know you do
Possible she wants you too
There is one way to ask her
It don't take a word
Not a single word
Go on and kiss the girl

zh: 男孩太害羞，不想亲吻那女孩
男孩好似害羞，不会亲吻女孩
这男孩太害羞，不敢亲那女孩
en: Look like the boy too shy Ain't gonna kiss the girl
Ain't that sad, Ain't it a shame
Too bad he gonna miss the girl
Now's your moment
Floating in a blue lagoon
Boy you better do it soon
No time will be better
She don't say a word
And she won't say a word
Until you kiss the girl
Don't be scared
You got the mood prepared
Don't stop now
Don't try to hide it how
You want to kiss the girl
Float along
And listen to the song
The song say kiss the girl
The music play
Do what the music say
You got to kiss the girl

zh: 只要你明了，我内心欲言的事
若你能知晓我想表达的心意
若你能知晓心中无尽的言词
en: If Only you could know The things I long to say

zh: 但愿我能告诉你，我想表达的情意
若我能向你倾诉，所愿传达的心意
如果我能告诉你，我想表达的东西
en: If only I could tell you What I wish I could convey
It's in my every glance
My heart's an open book

zh: 只需一眼，你便能明白我心意
只需你看一眼，一切尽收眼底
en: You'd see it all at once if only you would look

zh: 若你能窥见我所感受的情感，
若你能瞥见我感受到的情感
若你能瞥见我所感受的情感
en: If only you could glimpse the feelings that I feel

zh: 倘若你能察觉我渴望展示的情感
en: If only you would notice what I'm dying to reveal
The dreams I can't declare
The needs I can't deny

zh: 若你能一试，定会明白我所感
en: You'd understand them all if only you would try
All my secrets you would learn them
All my longings you'd return them
Then the silence would be broken
Not a word would need be spoken

zh: 她究竟有什么如此奇妙的熟悉感呢，啊哈夏花
en: What is it about her thats so wonderfully impossibily familiar?

zh: 为什么我头晕目眩，仿佛只曾经历过一次
我为何感到晕眩，如昔仅体验一次的感觉
我为何如此头晕，仿佛只在那一刻经历过
en: Why do I feel dizzy in a way I've only felt but once before?

zh: 何故望她眼神，时间仿佛静驻不动
何故她看我时，仿佛时光停滞不动
她看我时为何时间仿佛停滞不动
en: How come when she looks at me it seems like time stops moving

zh: 就像那天在岸边的感觉一样吗
就像那一天在海岸边的感觉吗
那天在岸边的情景多么相似啊
en: Almost like the way it did that day upon the shore?
If only it were true
If only for a while

zh: 若你懂我笑颜后藏着无尽的煎熬
若你能看见我笑后的苦楚该多好
但愿你能看见，我笑容背后痛如涛
en: If only you would notice how I ache behind my smile
I guess you never will
I guess it doesn't show

zh: 若我始终无法向你表达心意，
但是若我始终无法传达给你
若我永远寻不到法子告诉你
en: But if I never find a way to tell you so

zh: 若我知晓法，令他明光映现啊
若我能让他看见光，啊哈夏花
若能知晓使他看见光明之法
en: If only I knew how I'd make him see the light

zh: 若一切由我，便会圆满无瑕
en: If only it were up to me, this all would turn out right

zh: 若我能告诉，该如何做啊
en: And if I only could, I'd tell you what i'd do

zh: 假如我能挥舞利爪，圆你梦啊
若只我挥爪，实现你的愿望啊
若能挥动爪，实现你的梦想啊
en: I'd simply wave my claw and make your dreams come true

zh: 若你知晓，难道不会惊讶吗
若你知晓，会不会惊讶啊哈
若你知道真相，该有多惊讶
en: And wouldn't that surprise you if you only knew
If only you'd come home

zh: 若是你能回来，我要改过
如果你能回来，我就改过
en: If only you'd come back, I'll change my ways!
I'll try to understand
I'll keep my temper low

zh: 早该倾听你，悔当初未从您说
早就该听你的话，改过自新多
我早该开始倾听你的意见了
en: I should've started listening to you long ago
If only I could help
Just one more day for that kiss to come

zh: 愿用生命交换，实现梦想
我愿献出生命，实现愿望
愿用生命换取成全梦想
en: I'd give my life up to make it happen

zh: 但愿那个女孩能是她啊
我真希望那女孩就是她
真希望那个女孩就是她
en: How I wish that girl could have been this one!
And at the ball what will occur?
Maybe I'll find that voice
But I'll lose her

zh: 若有时光倒流，终会亲吻至暮
en: If only there were time, I know we'd kiss at last

zh: 时光无情飞逝，我们的瞬间将逝去
时间不停往前跑，我们时光将过去
可时间不停向前，我们时光将逝去
en: But time keeps racing forward and our moments almost past!
It has to happen now

zh: 时间紧迫，只剩一天我就要离去
en: There's only one more day until I have to go!
Welcome, dear friends, to our contest
The first that this kingdom has ever seen!

zh: 今日我们齐聚一堂展歌喉
今日聚首共襄盛举，展歌喉
en: We gather today for a vocal display
So our prince may at last choose a queen!
Listen to me
Don't I sound rich?
Loud, am I not?
Plus, I've got perfect pitch
Wouldn't you think I'm the girl, The girl who has everything?
Listen to this
Clear as can be!
You'll know I'm it when I hit my high C!

zh: 我乃世界级花腔女高音
世界著名的花腔女高音
en: I'm a world-famous coloratura!
My vibrato is second to none!

zh: 我是一位色彩炫技大师
en: I'm a walking display of bravura!
Mermaid and man
Finally can Join and be one!
Now they can smile, walking the aisle
here at their wedding celebration!
Sailing forward!
Standing steady!
Starting life, completely ready!

zh: 如今他们终于成真我愿
en: And now they can be who they're meant to be!

zh: 现在他们凝视新地平线
en: Now they can gaze on a new horizon!
Here between ocean and sky!
Forever and on!
Now they can walk
Now they can run

zh: 他们可以整天晒太阳啦
如今他们能整天晒太阳
en: Now they can stay all day in the sun!
Just you and me!
Ah we are the daughters of Triton,

zh: 大爱之父，善于命名我们
en: great father who loves us and named us well

zh: 音乐会希望启迪人鱼心
en: In concert we hope to enlighten

zh: 音乐涌动，启迪人鱼之心
en: the hearts of the merfolk with music's swell

zh: 然后我们的小妹妹开始音乐之旅
en: And then there is the youngest in her musical debut
Our seventh little sister
we're presenting her to you
to sing a song Sebastian wrote
Her voice is like a bell
She's our sister, Ariel!
This is where I belong,
Beneath the clear wide blue here!

zh: 我在这里感到全新的自己
en: I feel completely new here in the world above!
It’s like my life was wrong

zh: 甚幸，现，终于我自在肌肤
en: And somehow, now, at last I’m in my own skin
Up here in the world above!
There’s so much light here
Light and space!
The sun’s so bright here
Upon my face!
It feels so right here, warm as love
Life seems to be, almost calling to me
From this strange new world above!
Say thatcha wanna have a hairdo
Like the folds who live up there do
That'll flap their wigs!
Well, you'll look absolutely dandy
If you use one of these handy
Little thingmajigs!

zh: 拾起那咚钩猎人，就这般
en: Pick up the dinglehopper, just like so
Twirl it the way I'm twirling now!
Give it a little yank, and there ya go!
You're what the call "the dog's meow"!
And we are the authority
No need for us to bluff!

zh: 因为我们擅长解析人类事物
因为我们很棒，解读人类事物
因为我们很棒，解释人类事物
en: Because we're great and explanatin' Human stuff!
Back when the world was prehistorial
People sat as still as coral
Flat upon their bumps
There they would be, not even thinkin'
Bored to death and barely blinkin'
Way down at the dumps

zh: 然后偶然发明了个啥，是嘲讽号
en: Then they invented snarfblatts, just by chance
Suddenly life was la-di-da!
Snarfblatts're what you use to make folks dance
Give it a blow, and then, voila!
With proper dinglehopper groomin'

zh: 放心，你会变得非常人类
en: Rest assured...you'll look real human!
We know, 'cause we know Human stuff!

zh: 亲爱的爸爸临终前漂浮着
en: When daddy dear was floating on his deathbed

zh: 他把王国一分为二，给了我
父王临终慷慨分天下，两国
他将王国一分为二，赐予我
en: He divided up the kingdom into two
I got his magic shell
And half the sea as well
And for that, I get banished!
But me, I'm not mad

zh: 我只要一个小小的东西
我只想要那一点点东西
我只想要那一点点事儿
en: There's just one little thing that I want
Just one teensy thing that I want
I want the good times back!
I want those grand ol' days!
I want the twisted nights
The sick delights
The wild soirees!
I want those trembling crowds of shellfish
Cracked and peeled for me to dine
Not because I'm mean or selfish--
I only want what's mine!
I want disgusting wealth!
I want exquisite sin!
Want the entire sea to worship me
On bended fin!
I want to greet my loving subjects
And then have them as a snack!
Remember those good times?
I want them back!
You'll bring the good times back!
Resume your wacky fun!
Restore the joyful charm
Of causing harm to everyone!
I want to make the merfolk cower
Like they did in days of yore
Sure, it's sheer abuse of power--
Ain't that what power's for?
I want to taste their tears!
I want to hear their screams!

zh: 我想要品尝他们泪水的滋味
en: I want the special rush you get from crushing hopes and dreams!
It's more than simply sentimental--
It's an aphrodisiac!
Remember those good times!
If only I had a way
To make him pay
I'd set ol' Triton straight!
I want the little girl!
And boys, I want her bad!
I want her sitting here
To lure her dear Devoted dad!
I want my goody-goody brother
To come rescue her, the sap!
And then one way or another
I'll spring the trap!
And get the good times back!
I mean with all the perks!
The trident, crown, the throne
All mine alone!
Look at this stuff, Isn't it neat?
Wouldn't you think my collection's complete?
Wouldn't you think I'm the girl
The girl who has everything?
Look at this trove, Treasures untold

zh: 一洞之中能藏多少奇观
一个洞里能藏多少奇观
洞穴中能容纳多少奇观
en: How many wonders can one cavern hold?
Looking around here you'd think
Sure, she's got everything

zh: 拥有小玩意，奇巧玩意多
en: I've got gadgets and gizmo's and plenty

zh: 我有稀奇古怪的东西多
拥有杂七杂八的宝贝多
en: I've got woozits and whatzits galore
You want thingamabobs? I've got 20!

zh: 可谁在意无大事，欲望多
en: But who cares? No big deal, I want more!
I wanna be where the people are
I wanna see, Wanna see 'em dancing

zh: 四处走动在那，称其为何哦，足
en: Walking around on those, what do you call 'em? oh, feet!
Flipping your fins you don't get too far
Legs are required for jumping, dancing

zh: 漫步在街上，啊，街这个词是啥
沿着街道漫步，那个词呢街啊
en: Strolling along down the, What's that word again? Street
Up where they walk
Up where they run

zh: 上他们整天在阳光里，自由漫步
在阳光下度过完整天，自由漫步
en: Up where they stay all day in the sun, Wandering free
Wish I could be, Part of that world

zh: 我若能离开水中，何以报答恩
我若能离开这水域，愿付出什
en: What would I give If I could live Out of these waters?

zh: 我愿付何价，度过沙滩温暖一天
付出何代价，换取阳光沙滩一天
en: What would I pay To spend a day Warm on the sand?
Bet'cha on land, They understand
Bet they don't reprimand their daughters

zh: 聪明少女，厌倦游泳，准备站稳
聪明女子，厌倦游泳，准备挺身
靓女青年，厌倦游泳，准备起身
en: Bright young women, Sick of swimming, Ready to stand

zh: 我已准备了解众人所知
我已准备了解大众所知
我准备好了解众人所知
en: I'm ready to know what the people know

zh: 给他们我问题，寻求答案
请向他们提问，聆听回答
请问他们问题，听些回答
en: Ask 'em my questions and get some answers
What's a fire and why does it, What's the word? burn
When's it my turn?

zh: 多渴望，上岸探索那神秘世界
多希望，能去探那高高岸邊界
我心切，渴望探索那海天之界
en: Wouldn't I love, Love to explore the shore up above?

zh: 离开海洋，希望可以，成为世界
海洋之外，渴望成真，成那世界
en: Out of the sea, Wish I could be, Part of that world
What would I give to live where you are?

zh: 愿付出何，伴你左右享快乐
我愿付一切，陪在你身边，过
en: What would I pay to stay here beside you?

zh: 我将如何让你对我微笑呢
en: What would I do to see you smiling at me?

zh: 如果只走，如果奔跑，在阳光中度过一整天
en: Where would we walk, Where would we run, If we could stay all day in the sun?

zh: 只要彼此，情牵难分，共织世间
仅你和我，共度时光，成为一员
en: Just you and me, And I could be, Part of your world.
I don't know when, I don't know how,
But I know something's starting right now!

zh: 看吧你会见，总有天我，成你世界
en: Watch and you'll see, Someday I'll be, Part of your world!
She's dizzy and she's dreamy
Her head's up in the foam
Her eyes have gone all gleamy
It's like there's no one home
She floats away the days
Mopin' on the coastal shelf
You ask her where she's goin'
She giggles like a fool

zh: 她稍微尝试下水，岸边的潮汐池
en: She barely sticks a toe in, Down at the tidal pool
It's more than just a phase
Face it, she's just not herself
She's in love! She's in love!
Pounding heart! Ringing bells!

zh: 瞧，她甚至戴着全新的贝壳
瞧，她甚至戴着全新壳儿呢
看，她甚至戴了全新的贝壳
en: Look, I think she's even wearing brand new shells!
She acts like she don't see me
She doesn't even speak
She treats me like sashimi
Left over from last week
You see her late at night
Tossin' in her ocean bed
She's moody as a snapper
Oblivious as rocks
You swim right up and tap her
She lays there like a lox!
As sure as dogfish bite
Somethin's made her lose her head!
She has lost her head!
And she sighs, and she swoons
And she's hummin' little tunes
Even has a sorta glow
What on earth could it be?
She's flipped, it never fails!
All hot beneath her scales!
See her hips, how they swish!

zh: 你是否好奇海鲜佳肴得宠者
en: Don't you wonder who's the lucky seafood dish?
Where did she go?
Where can she be?

zh: 何时她再回来呼唤着我
她何时再回来呼唤着我
她何时会再向我呼唤呢
en: When will she come again Calling to me?

zh: 某个地方有个女孩，她就像水面上的风之微光
某个地方有个女孩，她就像风在水面上的闪光
在某处有个女孩，她如风掠过水面的闪烁光芒
en: Somewhere there's a girl Who's like the shimmer of the wind upon the water

zh: 海上阳光闪烁之处，有个女孩如其闪耀光芒
某处有个女孩，她闪烁如阳光在海上的光芒
海上阳光闪烁的女孩，犹如海面的粼粼波光
en: Somewhere there's a girl Who's like the glimmer of the sunlight on the sea

zh: 某处有个女孩，如同无尽音乐的波浪
某处有女孩，如无尽乐章的起伏激荡
某处有位女孩如无尽乐曲翻涌激荡
en: Somewhere there's a girl Who's like a swell of endless music

zh: 某个地方她唱歌，歌声为我而响
她在某处歌唱，歌声为我心所响
某处她在歌唱，这歌声为我而唱
en: Somewhere she is singing And her song is meant for me

zh: 她的声音甜如天使叹息，
她的声音甜如天使叹息
她的嗓音甜如天使叹息，
en: And her voice It's sweet as angels sighing
And her voice It's warm as summer sky

zh: 那声音，萦绕我梦，旋转心间
那声音缠绕，梦回旋绕不断
en: And that sound It haunts my dreams And spins me 'round
Until it seems I'm flying...

zh: 我能感知她的笑声在波浪拍打着海岸线荡漾
我能感知她笑声在波纹里，拍打着岸边响当当
我能感受她的笑声，随着海浪拍打着岸边荡漾
en: I can sense her laughter In the ripple of the waves against the shoreline

zh: 在月光洒向沙滩时，我看到她微笑的脸庞
我看见她在月光下微笑，月光洒在沙滩上
我看到她在月光下微笑，月光洒在沙滩上
en: I can see her smiling In the moonlight as it settles on the sand

zh: 能感知她在苍白地平线之外等候
我能感受她等待在苍白地平线后
en: I can feel her waiting Just beyond the pale horizon

zh: 在那动人旋律中，美丽无法抵挡
吟唱美妙旋律，难以抵挡的音浪
唱出一首歌曲美妙得无法抵挡
en: Singing out a melody too lovely to withstand

zh: 她的嗓音在黄昏中回荡
她的嗓音，随着黄昏降临
en: And her voice It's there as dusk is falling
And her voice It's there as dawn steals by
Pure and bright, it's always near
All day, all night
And still I hear it calling...
Strange as a dream
Real as the sea

zh: 若你听见我言，来解放我
若能听见我，现在解救我
若你听见我声，赐我解脱
en: If you can hear me now Come set me free

zh: 玫瑰上的雨滴与小猫胡须
雨滴玫瑰上，小猫胡须轻舞
玫瑰上的雨滴，小猫的胡须
en: Raindrops on roses and whiskers on kittens

zh: 亮铜壶亮，暖羊毛手套舒
en: Bright copper kettles and warm woolen mittens

zh: 棕色纸包装，用线绑牢固
en: Brown paper packages tied up with strings

zh: 这是我钟爱的几样事物
这些都是我喜爱的事物
这些都是我喜欢的事物
这是一些我喜欢的事物
这些是我心头所爱之物
此中有些，我心所爱之物
这些都是我喜爱之物儿
这些是我最爱的几件事
这是我最爱的一些事儿
en: These are a few of my favorite things

zh: 奶白色的小马和脆皮苹果酥
奶油色小马，香脆苹果卷儿舒
en: Cream colored ponies and crisp apple strudels

zh: 门铃雪橇铃，炖肉面条同舞
门铃雪橇铃，炸肉条面条煮
en: Doorbells and sleigh bells and schnitzel with noodles

zh: 飞翔的大雁，月映翅膀舞
飞翔的野雁，月在翅膀舞
野雁月下飞，翼映月光舞
en: Wild geese that fly with the moon on their wings

zh: 白裙女孩，蓝色缎带缠身儿
en: Girls in white dresses with blue satin sashes

zh: 白衣女孩鼻睫毛上的雪花儿
en: Snowflakes that stay on my nose and eyelashes

zh: 白雪融化，化为春天景致
白色的冬季化为春天绿
en: Silver white winters that melt into springs
When the dog bites
when the bee stings
When I'm feeling sad

zh: 我只需记起我钟爱的物事
我只需回忆那些美好的事
我只想起我心所爱的物事
en: I simply remember my favorite things
And then I don't feel so bad

zh: 你等待在空舞台，小女儿
en: You wait little girl on an empty stage
For fate to turn the light on

zh: 小女孩你的人生如白纸
生活小姑娘如空白纸儿
你的一生小女孩如白纸
en: Your life little girl is an empty page
That men will want to write on

zh: 你十六岁，即将要十七岁，啊
你已十六岁将迈向十七，呀
你十六岁，即将要十七岁，啊
en: You are sixteen going on seventeen,
baby it's time to think

zh: 更要小心，机智且谨慎，宝贝
en: Better beware, be canny and careful,
baby you're on the brink
fellows will fall in line
Eager young lads, and roues and cads
Will offer you food and wine
Totally unprepared are you,
to face a world of men
Timid and shy and scared are you,
of things beyond your ken

zh: 你需要一位年长智慧的人，指导你，
你需要一个更大更聪明的，指导你
en: You need someone older and wiser,
telling you what to do
I am seventeen going on eighteen,
I'll take care of you

zh: 我十六岁，即将迈向十七，嗯
我十六岁，即将要十七岁，嗯
en: I am sixteen going on seventeen,
I know that I'm naive

zh: 遇到的人可能说我甜，嗯
en: Fellows I meet may tell me I'm sweet,
and willingly I believe
innocent as a rose

zh: 花花公子们，品饮白兰地，嗯
en: Bachelor dandies, drinkers of brandies,
what do I know of those
Totally unprepared am I,
Timid and shy and scared am I,
of things beyond my ken

zh: 我需要个年长聪明的人，0
en: I need someone older and wiser,
telling me what to do

zh: 你十七岁，快到十八岁了
你十七岁马上要十八了
你十七岁，即将要十八了
en: You are seventeen going on eighteen,
I'll depend on you

zh: 你这迷人的充满理想主义者
你这位可爱迷人理想主义者，
en: You dear attractive dewy-eyed idealist,

zh: 今天你要学做现实主义者
en: Today you have to learn to be a realist.

zh: 你可能一心想要做英勇事迹，
或许你渴望勇敢无畏地行动
你可能一心想去做英勇之事，
en: You may be bent on doing deed of daring due,

zh: 但是面对鲨鱼，鲱鱼能做什么
然而面對鯊魚，鯡魚能做什麼
然而面临鲨鱼，鲱鱼能做什么
en: But up against a shark, what can a herring do?

zh: 让他们以为你同路，模棱两可
让他们以为你一边，模棱两可
en: Let them think you're on their side, be noncommittal

zh: 我不会屈服于我所憎恨之人
我绝不向卑鄙之人屈服低头
我绝不向那些讨厌的人低头
en: I will not bow my head to the men I despise!

zh: 不必低头屈服，稍微屈身便可
en: You won't have to bow your head to stoop a little.

zh: 何必不学会信任与依靠呢
为何不学会信任和依赖呢
en: Why not learn to put your faith and your reliance,

zh: 明显的科学事实，何须多言呢
en: On an obvious and simple fact of science?

zh: 疯狂星球充满疯狂人儿
疯狂星球遍布疯狂人士，
疯狂星球上疯狂的人儿，
en: A crazy planet full of crazy people,

zh: 在天空中疯狂翻腾不息
星球在天空中翻腾不息
在天空中翻腾旋转不已
en: Is somersaulting all around the sky.

zh: 每当星球翻跟斗变一个新样子
en: And everytime it turns another somersault,
Another day goes by.
And there's no way to stop it,
No, there's no way to stop it.

zh: 不，你尝试也无法阻止它
不，你尽力也无法阻挡它
不，你试了也无法阻止它
en: No, you can't stop it even if you tried.
So, I'm not going to worry,
No, I'm not going to worry,

zh: 每当我看见一天又逝去，忧愁
每次我看见日去换日来，有秋
每次看到时间流逝，岁月悠悠
en: Everytime I see another day go by.

zh: 在古怪的角度上翻跟头时，
在这种歪斜的角度翻腾时，
在一个歪斜的角度翻转时，
en: While somersaulting at a cockeyed angle,

zh: 在这走偏的圈中绕太阳
我们在歪斜轨道绕日行
我们绕太阳转个眼歪圈
en: We make a cockeyed circle 'round the sun.

zh: 当我们回到原点，重又开始时
当我们回到起点时，重归故地
en: And when we circle back to where we started from,
Another year has run.
You're a fool if you worry.
You're a fool if you worry,

zh: 超过任何事，只担心小我吧
别操心，只要照顾好自己啊
除了自己，凡事无需忧虑啊
en: Over anything but little number one.

zh: 每颗星星绕着旋转的星球，
每一个旋转星球上的明星，
每个旋转的星球上的星星
en: So every star on every whirling planet,

zh: 天空中每颗星星和星座，
而天空中的每一组星座，
那天空每颗星星的星座
en: And every constellation in the sky,

zh: 在宇宙中心旋转，那美丽的我
旋转的众星和天空中的星座
en: Revolves around the center of the universe,
That lovely thing called, I.
And there's no way to stop it.
No, there's no way to stop it,

zh: 我知道，但我说不出原因
我知道，却无法说明原因
我知道，无法告诉你原因
en: And I know, though I cannot tell you why.
Just as long as I'm living,

zh: 没有什么能比我更奇妙的了
人生一大乐事，无与伦比的我
我的独一无二，无与伦比的我
en: There'll be nothing else as wonderful as I.
She climbs a tree
And scrapes her knee
Her dress has got a tear.
She waltzes on her way to mass
And whistles on the stair.
And underneath her wimpole
She has curlers in her hair!

zh: 我曾在修道院里听她唱歌
我曾在教堂里听到她唱歌
我在教堂里曾听她歌唱过
en: I ever hear her singing in the abbey.
She's always late for chapel,
But her penitence is real.
She's always late for everything,
Except for every meal.
I hate to have to say it
But I very firmly feel

zh: 玛利亚并非修道院之利
en: Maria's not an asset to the abbey!
When I'm with her I'm confused,
Out of focus and bemused,

zh: 我从来都不清楚身处何方
我总不清楚自己身处何方
我常常迷糊，不知身处何方
en: And I never know exactly where I am.
Unpredictable as weather,
She's as flighty as a feather
She is gentle,
She is wild,
She's a riddle.
She's a child.
A bell is no bell till you ring it
A song is no song till you sing it

zh: 你心中的爱并非永恒存在
心中爱非留，奉献时才显爱
en: And love in your heart wasn't put there to stay

zh: 爱在心中，不表达不算爱
爱非爱，直到付出方显爱
爱情不存，除非你送出爱
en: Love is not love till you give it away

zh: 当你十六岁，迈向十七岁轮
en: When you are sixteen going on seventeen
Waiting for life to start
Somebody kind who touches your mind
Will suddenly touch your heart
When that happens, after it happens
Nothing is quite the same
Somehow you know, you'll jump up and go
If ever he calls your name
Gone are your old ideas of life
The old ideas grow dim
Lo and behold, you're someone's wife
And you belong to him
You may think this kind of adventure
Never may come to you

zh: 亲爱的十六，即将十七爱
en: Darling sixteen going on seventeen
Wait a year or two

zh: 山岗之上有孤独牧羊人
山上的孤独牧羊人，嗯林
高山之上，孤独的牧羊人
en: High on a hill was a lonely goatherd
Lay odl-lay odl-lay hee-hoo

zh: 响亮的孤独牧羊人嗓音
en: Loud was the voice of the lonely goatherd

zh: 偏远小镇的人们听到了
遥远的小镇居民听见了
偏远小镇的人们听说了
en: Folks in a town that was quite remote heard
Lusty and clear from the goatherd's throat heard

zh: 王子城堡护城河桥上游哉
en: A prince on the bridge of a castle moat heard

zh: 路人们负重前行声传来
en: Men on a road with a load to tote heard

zh: 中午宴席间的男人听到，
餐厅中用餐的人们听闻
餐馆中用餐的人听到了
en: Men in the midst of a table d'hote heard

zh: 喝啤酒泡沫飘浮声传来
听人们喝啤酒泡沫漂白
喝啤酒泡沫飘洒声传来
en: Men drinking beer with the foam afloat heard

zh: 一位小女穿淡粉衣领闻
en: One little girl in a pale pink coat heard

zh: 她唱着回应孤独的牧羊人
她回应了那孤独的牧羊人
女孩回应那孤独的牧羊人
en: She yodeled back to the lonely goatherd
Soon her Mama with a gleaming gloat heard
What a duet for a girl and goatherd
There's a sad sort of clanging
From the clock in the hall
And the bells in the steeple too
And up in the nursery
An absurd little bird
Is popping out to say cuckoo
Regretfully they tell us
But firmly they compel us
To say goodbye to you
So long farewell
Auf wiedersehen good night
I hate to go and leave
This pretty sight
Adieu adieu
To you and you and you
I'd like to stay and
Taste my first champagne
I leave and heave a sigh
And say goodbye goodbye
I'm glad to go
I cannot tell a lie
I flit I float
I fleetly flee I fly

zh: 太阳落山了，我也该睡了
日落西山，我也该就寝了
太阳已落山，我也该睡了
en: The sun has gone to Bed and so must I
Climb ev'ry mountain
Search high and low

zh: 走遍每条小路，熟知每条路
走遍各条小路，熟知每条路
走遍每条小路，熟悉每条路
en: Follow every byway, every path you know
Ford ev'ry stream
Follow ev'ry rainbow
Till you find your dream
A dream that will need
All the love you can give
Everyday of your life
For as long as you live
Perhaps I had a wicked childhood

zh: 也许我度过痛苦年少时
也许我曾有苦痛少年时
或许我年少时痛苦无比
en: Perhaps I had a miserable youth

zh: 但是我那邪恶困苦的过去里
但在我那恶劣痛苦的过去里
但我在那邪恶悲惨的往昔里
en: But somewhere in my wicked miserable past
There must have been a moment of truth

zh: 你在这儿，站着呢，爱我呢
你在这里，站那边，爱着我
en: For here you are, standing there, loving me
Whether or not you should
So somewhere in my youth or childhood
I must have done something good
Nothing comes from nothing
Nothing ever could

zh: 如何解决玛利亚般的问题
如何解决玛丽亚般的问题
如何解决玛利亚这个难题
en: How do you solve a problem like Maria?

zh: 如何捉住云彩让它停留
如何捕云定，捉摸难留手
en: How do you catch a cloud and pin it down?

zh: 如何找到形容玛丽亚的词
如何觅寻那似玛利亚之词
如何寻得代表玛利亚的词
en: How do you find a word that means Maria?

zh: 一个轻浮善变捉摸不定的小丑
一个轻浮善变，捉摸不定的小丑
一个轻飘飘的，似幻似真的，小丑
en: A flibbertigibbet a will-o'-the-wisp a clown!

zh: 你知道许多事情想告诉她
千言万语，你知道想告诉她
许多事你知道你想告诉她
en: Many a thing you know you'd like to tell her

zh: 许多事情她本应理解啊
许多事情她应该明白啊
en: Many a thing she ought to understand
But how do you make her stay
And listen to all you say?

zh: 如何让沙上的浪不消散
如何让沙上的波浪不散
如何让海浪停留在沙滩
en: How do you keep a wave upon the sand?

zh: 噢，如何解开玛利亚之谜团
en: Oh, how do you solve a problem like Maria?

zh: 你如何握月光在手心间
如何把月光握在手心间
怎样把月光握在手里面
en: How do you hold a moonbeam in your hand?
Edelweiss, Edelweiss
Every morning you greet me
Small and white, Clean and bright
You look happy to meet me
Blossom of snow may you bloom and grow
Bloom and grow forever
Bless my homeland forever
Doe, a dear, a female deer
Ray, a drop of golden sun
Me, a name I call myself
Far, a long long way to run
Sew, a needle pulling thread
LA, a note to follow SO
Tea, a drink with jam and bread
That will bring us back to DO
When you know the notes to sing
You can sing most anything
The hills are alive
With the sound of music
With songs they have sung
For a thousand years
The hills fill my heart

zh: 我心中的歌欲唱遍所闻
心中渴望唱出所闻之曲
心中乐声起，欲歌闻每曲
en: My heart wants to sing every song it hears
My heart wants to beat
Like the wings of the birds that rise
From the lake to the trees
My heart wants to sigh
Like a chime that flies
From a church on a breeze
To laugh like a brook

zh: 当它在前行中绊石头跌倒
沿途绊倒石头时，总是欢笑
當它在前行時，被石頭絆倒
en: When it trips and falls over stones on its way
To sing through the night
Like a lark who is learning to pray
I go to the hills
When my heart is lonely
I know I will hear
What I've heard before
My heart will be blessed
And I'll sing once more
